<s> wenger came close to departing a year ago and arsenals subsequent travails made it increasingly likely he would go this summer so they are sure to have been surveying the managerial market for some time </s>
<s> in the interim period that market has changed  and so has the makeup of the gunners hierarchy  but they would have had a clear idea of who they wanted to talk with </s>
<s> while it is possible that discreet scouting due diligence and enquiries to establish potential interest and availability may have been conducted while wengers future was undecided out of respect i do not think any significant moves took place behind his back </s>

<s> the problems between tuchel and arsenals head of recruitment sven mislintat from their time together at borussia dortmund were repairable but tuchel accepted psgs offer to replace unai emery to end any idea of him joining the gunners </s>
<s> whether or not the reported interest in germany boss joachim low was genuine it would never have materialised because he was always planning to sign a new contract with the national team </s>
<s> meanwhile and for various reasons the likes of diego simeone of atletico madrid former barcelona manager luis enrique threetime champions league winner carlo ancelotti and celtics brendan rodgers were never seriously considered </s>
<s> there is though said to have been enormous interest in the vacancy and after a long list was reduced to a shortlist juventus coach allegri manchester city assistant arteta and new york city boss patrick vieira emerged as the leading contenders </s>
<s> arteta and vieira were definitely spoken to and  whether directly or indirectly  allegri was too </s>
<s> in this tightly guarded process it is unclear if  and to what extent  there was contact with julian nagelsmann of hoffenheim belgium assistant thierry henry outgoing psg boss emery and monacos leonardo jardim </s>
<s> what we do know is that arsenal have held formal interviews and indepth negotiations </s>
<s> their hope is to make the right decision rather than a quick one </s>
<s> they insist the new man will continue the values instilled by wenger play exciting and progressive football represent arsenal well and integrate young players </s>
<s> arteta is the frontrunner  he wants the job and there is a feeling among staff that he is set to get it  but while it would seem vieira has drifted out of contention whispers persist that allegri remains in the mix </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> massimiliano allegri has won four consecutive serie a titles with juventushow has the clubs new structure impacted the manager searchchief executive ivan gazidis is overseeing a major overhaul of arsenals sporting operation </s>
<s> in the past year mislintat has arrived as head of recruitment raul sanllehi as head of football relations huss fahmy as contract negotiator and darren burgess as director of high performance </s>
<s> former captain per mertesacker will take over as academy manager this summer joined there by exgunners midfielder freddie ljungberg in a role still to be decided </s>
<s> so a framework has been created to prepare for life after wenger  and now the frenchman is gone many of his longestserving lieutenants have followed </s>
<s> contract and transfer negotiator dick law and chief scout steve rowley had already moved on before wengers sidekick boro primorac firstteam coach neil banfield goalkeeping coach gerry peyton fitness coach tony colbert equipment manager paul johnson and head of medical services colin lewin were all released </s>
<s> there have also been major structural and intellectual developments at the youth training base at hale end and the senior one at london colney as the hierarchy attempt to transform arsenal back into a competitive force </s>
<s> contrary to popular opinion it is consistently reiterated by the club that american owner stan kroenke is desperate for success and it might not be coincidental that a lot of the changes have come as his son josh  a fellow director  has spent a greater amount of time around arsenal become a more visible presence and exerted increasing influence </s>
<s> in a divergence from the previous regime  wenger retained total power over football matters and built the surrounding structure around himself  arsenal will now adopt a continental model </s>
<s> the daytoday power will be held by the leadership group they will define the structure and a head coach must slot into it </s>
<s> the search for wengers successor is the responsibility of gazidis aided by sanllehi and mislintat and they will present their recommendation to the board for approval fahmy is handling all contract matters and burgess is carrying out most of the technical changes particular on the medical side </s>
<s> are fans and the club on the same page </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> arsenal fans paid tribute to arsene wenger in his final games in charge but some sections of the support had called for him to leave earlierin addition to the criteria arsenal are seeking from their next manager gazidis said the club need to be openminded and brave </s>
<s> he pointed out that wenger was hardly a household name when he joined in 1996 adding that doesnt mean we have to make another appointment that not everybody is thinking and talking about but it does mean we need to be bold and get the person we believe is the right person </s>
<s> the implication is that the gunners are not averse to taking a gamble which theoretically is what somebody of artetas minimal experience represents compared to the likes of a proven allegri </s>
<s> gazidis is known to rate arteta extremely highly and you sense the chief executive would have no hesitation about placing him at the helm </s>
<s> this contrasts with the feeling among sections of the arsenal support where the reaction to the spaniards candidacy has been mixed </s>
<s> there would be fewer reservations over an allegritype appointment which would undoubtedly generate more initial excitement and help galvanise a fanbase that became divided and apathetic towards the end of wengers reign </s>
<s> that said of those who have emerged as the most credible options none would receive a hostile reception </s>
<s> there was sufficient clamour for change so the new man will be given a fair crack </s>
<s> a prospective concern for arsenals hierarchy is that with power comes accountability and the removal of wenger strips them of a shield that had provided such robust protection for so long </s>
<s> that is one of several reasons why it is so important to get this appointment right </s>
<s> the relationship between the fans and hierarchy is not good </s>
<s> if this goes badly and the supporters are further angered and alienated then trouble looms </s>
<s> au revoir arsene  arsenal fan dermot oleary says goodbyethe brilliant revolutionary who refused to changethe other big question  how much will the new boss have to spend </s>

<s> so bigname signings are unrealistic and they will have to be creative and maximise the connections and experience that mislintat and sanllehi bring </s>
<s> there is a perception that a lack of finance is among the factors contributing to an apparent struggle to lure a manager of allegris calibre though arsenal reject this and are adamant their job is one of the most attractive in world football </s>
<s> it is understood player recruitment was an area discussed with interviewed candidates and therefore any signings made before or after the appointment will supposedly have the incoming managers blessing </s>
<s> as per the continental model arsenals new head coach will contribute to recruitment decisions and retain the power of veto but unlike in the past he will not be the only voice that matters </s>
<s> mislintat will lead the search and pursue agreed targets with sanllehi charged with closing the deals </s>

<s> john motson explains his decision to hang up his microphone with the bbc </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> watch a special night of bbc shows dedicated to john motson on bbc two on 19 may from 2030 bstmy last season as a commentator has come to an end but i feel like i am going out on a high </s>
<s> it has been an incredibly exciting season with how manchester city have played and the records they have broken </s>
<s> pep guardiolas side have really lit up my final year in the commentary box </s>
<s> they have really brought about a significant change in english football with the style they have developed and the ability they have shown throughout their championshipwinning campaign </s>
<s> since my retirement was announced ive had a wonderful reception from all the clubs i have been to this season and have been given some fantastic gifts </s>
<s> i got a skyblue sheepskin coat at manchester city while arsenal presented me with a lovely silver cannon in a beautiful case </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i have almost been embarrassed by the reception i have had </s>
<s> every club has been so hospitable and ive even been told im welcome to come back when im retired which is very nice because i dont want to lose my contact with football </s>
<s> the fans have also shown me a great deal of warmth and affection which i will always be grateful for </s>
<s> quiz how well do you know mottyronnies rocket helped shaped my career </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> fa cup classics hereford united v newcastle 1972my very first tv commentary was a scoreless draw between liverpool and chelsea in october 1971 </s>
<s> it was not a very distinguished game or a distinguished commentary either i might add </s>
<s> the one that put me on the map was my first fa cup tie when hereford beat newcastle in a thirdround replay in 1972 with ronnie radfords goal  everyone will remember that </s>
<s> i was still on trial that year on television so it was a big day for me </s>
<s> i went down there thinking that newcastle were going to have a comfortable win </s>
<s> the guy who drove me down to hereford for the game was called billy meadows he was their centreforward </s>
<s> he took me down with rickie george who was to come and score the winning goal in extra time after radford hit a 40yarder </s>
<s> billy then drove us home because they both lived near me in barnet and we sat in billys front room and had fish and chips and listened to american pie before match of the day came on and there wonder of wonders was my match propelled to the top of the show </s>
<s> i didnt look back after that because the bbc realised then i was capable of commentating on important matches </s>
<s> going with the flow </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> gazzas tears  the crazy gang five of mottys best </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i have always tried to be spontaneous </s>
<s> i have never planned before the game things i was going to say if so and so happens </s>
<s> i suppose the comment people mostly associate with me is when wimbledon beat liverpool in the 1988 fa cup final and i said the crazy gang have beaten the culture club </s>
<s> that was definitely spur of the moment because people did not really expect wimbledon to win </s>
<s> i had gone down to plough lane a couple of weeks before to watch wimbledon </s>
<s> dennis wise took a corner and lawrie sanchez ran across and flicked it in with his head </s>
<s> i made a mental note of that and then the same thing happened in the final </s>
<s> what ill also never forget from that game was being able to get into the wimbledon dressing room with des lynam </s>
<s> i had never been in a teams dressing room straight after a cup final but wimbledon were that kind of club </s>
<s> they were down to earth and we built up a good relationship with them </s>
<s> things like that and cup finals internationals world cups and european championships have all been my highlights </s>
<s> these are the memories i treasure the most </s>
<s> my memorable games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> 1982 world cup  rossi hattrick sinks brazilive commentated on thousands of football matches but i would have to say there are two that i will always remember </s>
<s> the first would be the italybrazil game at the 1982 world cup in spain when paolo rossi scored a hattrick </s>
<s> brazil only needed a draw to go through to the semifinals but they went on attacking and the italians beat them thanks to rossis goals </s>
<s> it was a fantastic game </s>
<s> sir bobby charlton cocommentating next to me was in tears because it was so emotional at the end </s>
<s> brazil thought they had a team to win the world cup and to rival their 1970 side </s>
<s> rossi who was returning from a ban for matchfixing made himself a hero at that tournament and italy went on to win the final beating west germany which by the way was my first world cup final as a commentator </s>
<s> the other game i will always remember was when england beat germany 51 in munich in a world cup qualifier in 2001 under svengoran eriksson </s>
<s> id experienced so many disappointments with england as a commentator so this was a match that really will live long in the memory </s>
<s> i never expected such a performance on german soil </s>
<s> michael owens hattrick will always come back to me </s>
<s> i said it is getting better and better and better </s>
<s>  and of course it did </s>
<s> funnily enough a few weeks later i was at west ham and someone tapped me on the should and said it is getting better and better and better </s>
<s>  i turned round and it was erikssonengland still had to work hard to qualify and another game that is still fresh in my memory was when david beckham equalised against greece at old trafford with a lastminute freekick which made sure we were going to the world cup finals </s>
<s> gazza was the best english player i have ever seen </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> paul gascoignes sublime euro 96 goal against scotlandive been lucky to have seen some great teams at international and club level during my career </s>
<s> the liverpool team of the late 1970s and early 1980s is a team that was absolutely outstanding and then of course manchester united came along with sir alex fergusons different teams </s>
<s> i have seen the whole of arsene wengers arsenal career and now we have this manchester city team </s>
<s> i have seen some of the finest teams and managers of the game and ive experienced the influx of overseas players which has been one of the biggest developments in my time at the microphone  the eric cantonas and the thierry henrys </s>
<s> however i think the outstanding english player i have seen was probably paul gascoigne </s>
<s> he would be right up there with all those fine overseas players we have seen come in and have still got in the premier league </s>
<s> shirt numbers and substitutions </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> archive motds tribute to john motsoncommentating these days is more difficult in some ways  and easier in others </s>
<s> what has made it more difficult now is the shirt numbers </s>
<s> it used to be a simple 111 and you knew where everybody was going to play  and now of course the numbers vary so you get 24 38 56 etc </s>
<s> that is more difficult because you cant remember numbers as easily as when they are consecutive </s>
<s> the other thing that has changed is the substitutes </s>
<s> when i started there was only one substitute so you only had 12 players to worry about but now there are seven so thats 18 players  and that is just on one side </s>
<s> when they change them quickly in the last 10 minutes  each team being allowed to put three on and take three off  the names do get a little jumbled up in your mind and you have to try and change the lineup in your head and hope you have the right player on and off </s>
<s> where it might be easier is that when i started in 1971 with barry davies as the other main commentator we didnt get a replay of any goals because the only replay machine was used for horse racing </s>
<s> that meant when a goal was scored barry and i had to pack it with words as the players went back to the centre circle and hope that we got the buildup right </s>
<s> match of the day editors didnt put the replays in until that evening so there was a bit of a nervous wait to see if you had actually described the buildup to the goal correctly </s>
<s> the moments ill miss </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> john motson was still producing his colourcoded notes for every match this seasoni will miss the moment of excitement and adrenaline when they kick off particularly at 3pm on a saturday which i have been doing for 50 years </s>
<s> perhaps i wont miss so much the hassle of preparing for the games  checking and rechecking facts  and the travelling </s>
<s> all the preparation is quite demanding on the commentator particularly on the thursday and friday of every week </s>
<s> ill miss the friendship and connection and contact with lots of people both in broadcasting and the football world </s>
<s> and a piece of advice for budding commentators </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> you just need hard work and perseverance </s>
<s> get to know the game and the people in it </s>
<s> identify the players never mind all the facts and figures you can bring in that has to be the number one requirement </s>
<s> i dont think that has changed in 50 years </s>

<s> show more updatesgoalferraris curved wing mirrors were seen to have given them an aerodynamic advantagethe controversial wing mirrors used by ferrari at last weekends spanish grand prix have been banned by formula 1 </s>
<s> the sports governing body the fia did not approve of the way the mirrors were mounted to the halo headprotection device on the car </s>
<s> teams may still mount mirrors on the halo following a rule clarification but they must have only an incidental or minimal aerodynamic effect </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the fia felt ferraris mirrors gave them too much aerodynamic gain </s>
<s> ferraris sebastian vettel finished fourth and kimi raikkonen retired after 25 laps at the circuit de barcelonacatalunya in a race won by mercedes lewis hamilton </s>
<s> in future any team that wants to mount wing mirrors on the halo must do so with only a single mounting or any secondary one must satisfy two criteriait must provide a meaningful structural contribution to the mounting system which teams may be asked to demonstrate to officialsit must be mounted to the lower andor inboard surfaces of the mirror housingferraris secondary mount was above the mirror and formed an outwardleaning curve that had the effect of a small wing smoothing the airflow rear of the structure </s>
<s> the fia said it acknowledged that the rules currently in force with regard to mirrors are not perfect and will strive to propose a more complete set of rules in terms of mirror position mountings visibility etc </s>
<s> in the near future with the aim to get a unanimous support for such changes for 2019 </s>

<s> but what is worrying on this occasion is that the teams hierarchy is struggling to see a stable future without significant changes being implemented </s>
<s> speaking last month deputy team principal claire williams claimed f1 was basically broken because of financial discrepancies between the top teams and the rest and called for the sports owners liberty media to approve a budget cap currently under consideration </s>
<s> so how did it come to this for one of the sports most famous and enduring names dont forget to cast your vote on whether f1 should introduce a budget cap at the bottom of this article </s>
<s> from leaders to feedersfrank williams set up his eponymous williams grand prix engineering operation in 1977 and success was quick to follow thanks to the design nous of patrick head the bullish driving of australias alan jones and the pace and durability of the cosworth dfv engine </s>
<s> the teams maiden world title followed arrived in 1980  jones delivering on his early promise  before keke rosberg 1982 nelson piquet 1987 nigel mansell 1992 alain prost 1993 damon hill 1996 and jacques villeneuve 1997 followed suit </s>
<s> the teams success in the 1980s and 1990s  which came amid fierce duels with mclaren and ferrari  delivered them nine constructors championships a record second only to ferraris 16 </s>
<s> williams innovative engine and technical partnerships with honda and renault were key to their competitiveness which in turn allowed them to compete for the best drivers and designers </s>
<s> but as costs soared during the 2000s the team trickled down the order their place at the sharp end of the grid no longer assured as the likes of mclaren  bolstered by mercedes backing  and ferrari grew ever stronger thanks to the support of their road car divisions </s>
<s> williams as a privateer had no such backing and it quickly took a toll on results </s>
<s> perhaps this is best demonstrated by the fact that williams 113th grand prix win came in 2004 and their 114th in 2012 </s>
<s> they are still awaiting win number 115 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> analysis andrew benson  chief f1 writerwilliams are last in the constructors championship after five races this year and in grave danger of finishing there if they cannot turn their season around quickly </s>
<s> last weekends spanish grand prix highlighted their problems  a difficult slow car and inexperienced drivers meant lots of mistakes qualifying at the back and zero points </s>
<s> the team know what is wrong </s>
<s> the car has a fundamental aerodynamic flaw  the rear floor suffers an aerodynamic stall on corner entry making it unpredictable to drive </s>
<s> new parts to fix the problems are on their way but are not expected until just before the summer break  at the halfway point of the season </s>
<s> these are worrying times for a once great team </s>
<s> they have two unconvincing pay drivers in the car making it more difficult to be sure of the cars actual level </s>
<s> as for the future with performance as bad as this what proven wellrated driver would want to go there </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> claire williams took over daytoday running of the team from father frank in 2013surviving not racingwilliams now have the youngest drivers on the grid with 19yearold lance stroll and the 22yearold russian sergey sirotkin </s>
<s> both have struggled this season with their best result strolls eighth in azerbaijan </s>
<s> stroll says the team are surviving not racing and he was struggling with balance issues throughout all five races this season adding the car wasnt cooperating the way i wanted it to the balance was all over the place </s>
<s> sirotkin meanwhile said the seat in his car was so painful he struggled to make it through the spanish grand prix in barcelona last time out </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so whats nextthe team want a level playing field when it comes to budgets with claire williams admitting she was ready to crack open some champagne after liberty media said it would consider proposals for a 150m spending cap by 2021 </s>
<s> such a move is unlikely to appeal greatly to teams such as mercedes and ferrari who spend around three times that figure but claire williams is blunt about the cost of inaction </s>
<s> if we dont do this then williams will close the whole of the company she said recently </s>
<s> sometimes you almost need to hit rock bottom to make you address the areas that you may have papered over previously </s>
<s> for the sake of one of the sports greatest teams lets hope they do not have any further to fall </s>

<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> talent and performance followed into the noughties with drivers such as juan pablo montoya but by then costs were beginning to really ramp upbernd stange faced fabio capellos england in 2009 while working as belarus coachfrom saddam hussein to bashar alassad </s>
<s> from bullets being fired at his bodyguard to witnessing sites of suspected chemical attacks </s>
<s> bernd stange is evidently not a man who believes in an easy life </s>
<s> a former coach of iraq the 70yearold german has signed a contract to lead syria until the 2019 asian cup </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but what motivates him to work in a country where according to the syrian observatory for human rights more than 400000 people have been killed or reported missing over seven years of wari believe we should bring back a smile to syrian people who have suffered for such a long time he told the bbcs world football programme </s>
<s> they love football </s>
<s> but for a man who spends half of his time in capital city damascus there are psychological challenges that come with life in a war zone </s>
<s> i saw destroyed ghouta and douma he said referring to the sites of suspected chemical attacks </s>
<s> sometimes you hear what you think is lightning but its bombing </s>
<s> i will not say it is normal life </s>
<s> if you are travelling to aleppo to homs and you see whats happened there left and right of the street you cannot speak for a while and you are deeply depressed </s>
<s> its such an old country and damascus is a wonderful city </s>
<s> if you feel how long it will take to clean up the country and to bring back normal life maybe it will take one generation </s>
<s> they sang my name  my heart was brokenfor some the syrian national team is a representative of assads brutal crackdown against rebellion </s>
<s> stange is yet to meet the syrian president but said if i have the chance to see him of course i will go </s>
<s> the football federation is run independently by only a few people and its not involved in any politics </s>
<s> i can take my own decisions its part of my contract </s>
<s> stange also never met former president saddam hussein while coaching iraq a job he held for two years from 2002 </s>
<s> nevertheless he was referred to as saddams coach in his homeland and heavily criticised </s>
<s> i coached the national team of iraq before the war and i was blamed for that especially by western media he said </s>
<s> i coached the same national team three weeks after the war when everything was destroyed and from this moment i achieved so many awards for doing the same job coaching a football team to put the ball in the net </s>
<s> a day before the usled invasion that finally toppled saddam in 2003 stange left iraq on the orders of the german embassy </s>
<s> i went back one week after the war with the idea to tell them face to face that i will not continue my contract he said </s>
<s> when i arrived at the hotel i saw the players and their families and the whole football federation </s>
<s> they were waiting for me and singing my name captain stange is back is back </s>
<s> my heart was broken and being honest i was not able to tell them i will let you down </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bernd stange took his iraq squad to germany in 2003bush blair  and a fateful photograph with jack strawhaving changed his mind stange began to build a team that almost secured an olympic medal in athens in 2004 and went on to win the 2007 asian cup </s>
<s> everything was destroyed we didnt even have any balls we had absolutely nothing he said </s>
<s> we were training using sandbags </s>
<s> we had no warm water we could not practise in the evenings because of attacks </s>
<s> i tried to take the team out of this horrible baghdad at the time and i needed support </s>
<s> we needed money for flight tickets we needed visas </s>
<s> stange sought help from world leaders including former united states president george w bush then british prime minister tony blair and exitaly prime minister silvio berlusconi </s>
<s> i wrote letters to to help us to build football he said </s>
<s> i still have the letter that tony blair wrote to me </s>
<s> that led to a brief tour of england in 2004 </s>
<s> the football association managed hotels and games for us and they provided us with 5000 balls said stange </s>
<s> but a photoshoot with then foreign secretary jack straw ultimately prompted his departure from the team just weeks before the 2004 olympics </s>
<s> there was a photo in the garden of the parliament and half the team didnt want to be in it he said </s>
<s> they said maybe we will be blamed by terrorists or other people that we take presents from mortal enemies </s>
<s> but i thought it was very important to bring iraqis to london and to play football there to show that we are out of politics </s>
<s> unfortunately i got threats after this trip and very bad letters and my bodyguard had a bullet in his car </s>
<s> i decided to finish because it was too dangerous </s>
<s> stange returned to iraq in march when syria played in a friendly tournament in basra nine months after the return of international football to iraq </s>
<s> what he saw gave him hope for the future of syrian football </s>
<s> if you see the capacity crowd  65000 cheering people  if you see in the neighbourhood a stadium showing a public viewing with 10000 people watching then you can feel how happy they are to have their mostloved sport back in their country </s>
<s> hopefully it will be soon for the syrian people to play matches in aleppo and damascus </s>

<s> 74williams have finished in the points just once this seasonits no secret the williams team are struggling  weve seen it at every grand prix this season </s>
<s> five races into 2018 they sit bottom of the constructors championship their car clearly uncompetitive </s>
<s> they have been here before having failed to finish higher than eighth for three seasons between 2011 and 2013 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but what is worrying on this occasion is that the teams hierarchy is struggling to see a stable future without significant changes being implemented </s>
<s> speaking last month deputy team principal claire williams claimed f1 was basically broken because of financial discrepancies between the top teams and the rest and called for the sports owners liberty media to approve a budget cap currently under consideration </s>
<s> so how did it come to this for one of the sports most famous and enduring names dont forget to cast your vote on whether f1 should introduce a budget cap at the bottom of this article </s>
<s> from leaders to feedersfrank williams set up his eponymous williams grand prix engineering operation in 1977 and success was quick to follow thanks to the design nous of patrick head the bullish driving of australias alan jones and the pace and durability of the cosworth dfv engine </s>
<s> the teams maiden world title followed arrived in 1980  jones delivering on his early promise  before keke rosberg 1982 nelson piquet 1987 nigel mansell 1992 alain prost 1993 damon hill 1996 and jacques villeneuve 1997 followed suit </s>
<s> the teams success in the 1980s and 1990s  which came amid fierce duels with mclaren and ferrari  delivered them nine constructors championships a record second only to ferraris 16 </s>
<s> williams innovative engine and technical partnerships with honda and renault were key to their competitiveness which in turn allowed them to compete for the best drivers and designers </s>
<s> but as costs soared during the 2000s the team trickled down the order their place at the sharp end of the grid no longer assured as the likes of mclaren  bolstered by mercedes backing  and ferrari grew ever stronger thanks to the support of their road car divisions </s>
<s> williams as a privateer had no such backing and it quickly took a toll on results </s>
<s> perhaps this is best demonstrated by the fact that williams 113th grand prix win came in 2004 and their 114th in 2012 </s>
<s> they are still awaiting win number 115 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> analysis andrew benson  chief f1 writerwilliams are last in the constructors championship after five races this year and in grave danger of finishing there if they cannot turn their season around quickly </s>
<s> last weekends spanish grand prix highlighted their problems  a difficult slow car and inexperienced drivers meant lots of mistakes qualifying at the back and zero points </s>
<s> the team know what is wrong </s>
<s> the car has a fundamental aerodynamic flaw  the rear floor suffers an aerodynamic stall on corner entry making it unpredictable to drive </s>
<s> new parts to fix the problems are on their way but are not expected until just before the summer break  at the halfway point of the season </s>
<s> these are worrying times for a once great team </s>
<s> they have two unconvincing pay drivers in the car making it more difficult to be sure of the cars actual level </s>
<s> as for the future with performance as bad as this what proven wellrated driver would want to go there </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> claire williams took over daytoday running of the team from father frank in 2013surviving not racingwilliams now have the youngest drivers on the grid with 19yearold lance stroll and the 22yearold russian sergey sirotkin </s>
<s> both have struggled this season with their best result strolls eighth in azerbaijan </s>
<s> stroll says the team are surviving not racing and he was struggling with balance issues throughout all five races this season adding the car wasnt cooperating the way i wanted it to the balance was all over the place </s>
<s> sirotkin meanwhile said the seat in his car was so painful he struggled to make it through the spanish grand prix in barcelona last time out </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so whats nextthe team want a level playing field when it comes to budgets with claire williams admitting she was ready to crack open some champagne after liberty media said it would consider proposals for a 150m spending cap by 2021 </s>
<s> such a move is unlikely to appeal greatly to teams such as mercedes and ferrari who spend around three times that figure but claire williams is blunt about the cost of inaction </s>
<s> if we dont do this then williams will close the whole of the company she said recently </s>
<s> sometimes you almost need to hit rock bottom to make you address the areas that you may have papered over previously </s>
<s> for the sake of one of the sports greatest teams lets hope they do not have any further to fall </s>

<s> for example very rarely do you need to play two spinners in england </s>

<s> and once again the 31yearold spaniard is the favourite to win at roland garros </s>

<s> worryingly for his rivals he has picked up where he left off last year on the clay lifting his 11th titles in monte carlo and barcelona on his way to a record 50set winning streak on a single surface </s>

<s> federer waved au revoir until the summer following his miami open defeat in marchfor the second year running federer  who turns 37 in august  has decided to skip the entire claycourt season </s>
<s> when announcing his decision last year he spoke about the need to be smart with his scheduling to prolong his career and the french open  on his least favourite surface and a tournament which he has won only once in 2009  has been sacrificial </s>
<s> the decision proved to be a sensible one last year as a refreshed federer returned to the court for the grass season going on to lift a record eighth wimbledon title </s>
<s> the swiss maestro regained the world number one ranking in february after a blistering start to the year in which he claimed the australian open during a 17match winning run </s>

<s> alonsos front right tyre can be seen starting to collapse after a collision at the azerbaijan grand prixfernando alonso described his drive in the azerbaijan grand prix in which he took a badly damaged mclaren to a seventhplace finish as one of the best races of my life </s>
<s> only now though can it be revealed exactly how good a performance it was </s>

<s> but alonsos afternoon also deserves exploring </s>
<s> bbc sport was given exclusive access to the twotime champions car at the mclaren factory as it arrived back from baku and can reveal the extent of the damage and the effect on its performance </s>
<s> alonso himself was shown photographs of the damage to his car on monday and said on twitter now i have no doubt </s>
<s> it was an unrepeatable race </s>
<s> its not the first time the twotime world champion has talked up his own performances since joining mclaren and being saddled with an uncompetitive car </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> alonso tweeted this photo of his car after the race saying he was proud of his drivehow bad was the damagealonso was caught in a collision with two other cars between turns two and three on the first lap and suffered punctures in both his righthand tyres </s>
<s> by the time he reached turn 15 two corners before the long pit straight it was down to its wheel rims </s>
<s> the 36yearold somehow dragged the car back to the pits but in the process it suffered extensive damage </s>
<s> the aerodynamics of formula 1 cars are extremely sensitive and each flick and curve on the extensively sculpted bodywork is there for a reason  to enhance performance </s>
<s> i was not allowed to take photographs for confidentiality reasons </s>
<s> but the most dramatic damage to alonsos car was to what is called the teatray  the part of the floor that sticks out under the drivers legs and which helps define the airflow under and around the sides of the car </s>
<s> in the front of this there was a triangular hole about 30cm by 20cm as well as significant damage to the leading edge as if someone had set about it with a powerful hammer </s>
<s> some of the heavy tungsten ballast that is stored in the floor was missing </s>
<s> at the back of the car there was damage along the righthand side of the floor all the way from the very back of the diffuser  the upward slope at the rear  to forward of the rear wheel </s>
<s> two sculpted curves on the righthand side of the rear diffuser were gone </s>
<s> in front of the rear tyre two key aerodynamic shapers were missing too  what mclaren call a fence a longitudinal curve and a spat a sort of vertical rectangular scoopshape </s>
<s> all in all boullier said the damage cost 20 points of downforce more or less  so half a second a lap </s>
<s> despite this after changing tyres and front wing alonso returned to the race and lapped faster than teammate stoffel vandoorne on all but a handful of laps </s>
<s> how did he get it back to the pitseven getting the car back to the pits in the first place was something of an achievement boullier said </s>
<s> the front tyre deflated straight away after turn three and then it takes some time before you lose the tyre from the rim boullier said </s>
<s> the rear right tyre deflated i think around turn 15 </s>
<s> you can see from the television footage that after entering the pit lane the car is not driveable and actually he hit the wall on the righthand side </s>
<s> at that stage he told us after he did not know how to bring the car to the pit </s>
<s> he didnt know if the car would steer </s>
<s> he just tried to go straight on the fast lane and he thought he would leave it there and we would take it out of the race </s>
<s> at the last minute he turned and the car steered into the pitstop bay </s>
<s> we made a joke with him and said it was the best positioning of the weekend </s>
<s> he said lets change the tyres and front wing and go </s>
<s>  from the pit wall i saw these flames all around the floor </s>
<s> the car was on fire </s>
<s> mclaren could not see all the damage because the front floor is hidden by the aerodynamic shapers behind the tyres </s>
<s> so after checking the car was structurally sound and safe they sent alonso back out with new tyres and front wing </s>
<s> he spent a couple of laps asking what they could see from the data and whether they needed him to change any settings </s>
<s> it turned out that while it had lost downforce and was theoretically slower it felt ok to drive </s>
<s> actually the car was still more or less balanced strangely boullier says </s>
<s> the reason was there was this big hole in the front floor so we lost downforce at the front and rear </s>

<s> f1 driver jolyon palmer who left renault at the end of 2017 joins the bbc team this season to offer insight and analysis from the point of view of the competitors </s>
<s> the dramatic crash between red bull drivers daniel ricciardo and max verstappen in the azerbaijan grand prix was the result of an internal dynamic that does not exist at mercedes or ferrari </s>
<s> at the two top teams you get the feeling that there is a number one driver and a number two  even if that is not the case contractually </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> although both kimi raikkonen and particularly valtteri bottas have improved this year the continued success of sebastian vettel and lewis hamilton gives them a natural priority over their teammates </s>
<s> at red bull its a very different situation and baku laid bare the size of the problem that creates for the team </s>
<s> who is better verstappen or ricciardothey have an internal battle between two of the most talented drivers on the grid  some would argue the best driver pairing </s>
<s> but with that comes the intensity of each trying to prove their superiority in a fight that has been so close over the past couple of years </s>
<s> verstappen is seen as the golden boy in the team </s>
<s> on the back of a fantastic run in the second half of last year he got a lucrative multiyear contract extension while ricciardo did not </s>
<s> the australian will have felt a bit of pain from that as it clearly showed that the teams thinking even if they did not say it publicly was that verstappen was their best hope for the future and they wanted to tie him in </s>
<s> im sure red bull would love to keep ricciardo as well especially after the performance he produced to win this year in china but they have left the door open for him to leave </s>
<s> his future has become one of the key topics of conversation this year </s>
<s> the fight in baku was for fourth and fifth places </s>
<s> neither was going to finish higher than that unless someone else dropped out or there was contact </s>
<s> and there was no gain for the team whichever driver emerged ahead </s>
<s> from that point of view it was a relatively futile battle for just two points </s>
<s> but the intensity of it belied that </s>
<s> it was a battle of egos both desperate to assert themselves over the other </s>
<s> the buildup to the crash </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ricciardo turns the wheel left after initially going right committing to the inside for the slight gap he sees on verstappens insidethe way ricciardo and verstappen went at it was risky astonishing and initially brilliant to watch </s>
<s> the tone was set by verstappens aggression early on </s>
<s> his overtaking move on ricciardo into turn two at the safetycar restart on lap six laid down a marker </s>
<s> the problem was he then did not have ricciardos pace and held him up for the next 35 laps </s>
<s> many drivers in verstappens shoes would have taken a more cautious approach especially as he had had incidents in every race so far in 2018 was a lowly eighth in the standings and needed to start bringing home some strong results </s>
<s> but verstappen was as aggressive as ive seen him for a long time </s>
<s> every time ricciardo tried to pass on the outside verstappen would fly in from the inside late on the brakes his wheels locked up fighting to the death to hold onto that fourth position </s>
<s> at one point this even led to contact on the exit of turn one where the incoming barrier on the outside makes the track jink in on the exit </s>
<s> they were lucky to emerge from that unscathed </s>
<s> verstappens aggression came from the fact he is naturally a tough racer </s>
<s> he has always been fierce in wheeltowheel combat  not always getting it right but always getting stuck in and not being afraid to trade a bit of paint with his rivals </s>
<s> what added an extra edge to this was the previous race in china </s>
<s> there verstappen had the race to lose he was ahead of his teammate on track after red bull made their decisive decision to change tyres behind the safety car </s>
<s> but a big error and a collision dropped him well out of contention and he was left to watch as ricciardo swept to a brilliant victory </s>
<s> to see your teammate do that well is painful as a driver especially when you know it could have been you in their shoes and that its your own fault that it was not </s>
<s> after china everyone was waxing lyrical about ricciardos moves and questioning verstappens wheeltowheel skills </s>
<s> baku was a chance for verstappen to prove on track that he is every bit a match for his teammate and his aggression showed just how much doing that meant </s>
<s> who was to blame </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ricciardos dummy worked to move verstappen slightly but at 350kmh he is aiming for a tiny gap leaving zero margin for error or reaction from either driverit was absolutely brilliant to see the dicing between the two </s>
<s> but every time they got close into turn one i was wincing waiting for contact </s>
<s> such was the two drivers determination and willingness to risk that the longer it went on the more it seemed inevitable they would crash </s>
<s> ricciardo looked to have made the decisive move when he finally overtook verstappen on lap 35 around the outside into turn one </s>
<s> it was a brilliant pass ricciardo at his very best superdeep on the brakes giving verstappen no chance to come back </s>
<s> ricciardo probably thought he had finally cracked his teammate </s>
<s> so when verstappen reappeared ahead after their pit stops shortly afterwards it would have been galling for ricciardo </s>
<s> stopping one lap earlier should have given ricciardo the advantage but the slow warmup of his tyres meant he lost track position and had to do it all again </s>
<s> in my opinion verstappen was brave and maybe slightly foolish to be racing ricciardo so hard for the first 40 laps </s>
<s> equally though i believe ricciardo was the braver and potentially more culpable when they collided to end their races </s>
<s> its easy to blame verstappen because of his history  years of aggressive overthetop defending plus his difficult start to 2018 compared to ricciardos clean driving history and brilliant overtaking </s>
<s> but if people step back and analyse this incident in isolation it is much more 5050 </s>
<s> ricciardo tried to sell verstappen a dummy </s>
<s> to an extent it worked but then he fully committed his car to the inside to the smallest of gaps with a huge closing speed from which he could not bail out </s>
<s> this is at the end of a twokilometre straight and is the highest speed on the entire calendar </s>
<s> to be fighting for such a small gap at 350kmh 217mph is a huge risk that did not need to be taken </s>
<s> initially there was a slight gap there but when verstappen instinctively moved back to the left to shut it off contact was inevitable </s>
<s> technically this was two moves to defend from verstappen </s>
<s> and that is against the rules which say a driver cannot move more than once to defend his position </s>
<s> moving in the braking area to defend is a big nono in f1 because by that time its too late and the driver behind cannot do anything to avoid contact </s>
<s> in this case the movement from verstappen was a bit earlier than that and it was a tiny move to shut off a tiny gap that had opened on the inside </s>
<s> the moves were a matter of inches rather than sweeping across the width of the track which is more what the rules are aimed at preventing </s>
<s> verstappens driving was questionable but ricciardo was too committed and i think too ambitious the absolute definition of a doordie </s>
<s> and this time he got it slightly wrong </s>
<s> in ricciardos mitigation it is easy to see that his teammates overt aggression throughout the race might have wound him up a bit too much and he got suckered into the move </s>
<s> all in all i think the stewards were right to call it a racing incident </s>
<s> ultimately both were to blame </s>
<s> it was ambitious from ricciardo defending in a grey area on the limit from verstappen </s>
<s> but when these two were fighting like that for 40 laps i dont think many were surprised by the outcome in the end </s>

<s> f1 driver jolyon palmer who left renault at the end of 2017 joins the bbc team this season to offer insight and analysis from the point of view of the competitors </s>
<s> sebastian vettel and valtteri bottas will be heading to the chinese grand prix this weekend with contrasting emotions after their intense battle for victory in bahrain on sunday </s>
<s> vettel produced a masterclass in race management and composure in his ferrari to take his second win in succession this season eking out his soft tyres for 39 laps </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mercedes bottas meanwhile admitted he ended the race disappointed not to have snatched victory from vettel </s>

<s> bahrain was an incredibly tense nervy race between two teams  and ultimately two drivers  which came right down to the wire on the last lap as vettel just fended off bottas attack to win </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bottas left came off second best to vettel rightive been in situations like bottas was in </s>

<s> you relive the moment  in bottas case the first corner of the last lap  and think what if id have dived down the insideon balance the finn had a great weekend in bahrain </s>
<s> he outpaced teammate lewis hamilton in qualifying which is no mean feat and did a strong race to hunt down vettel managing his pace and tyres well throughout </s>
<s> bottas is an extremely good driver as i also mentioned in my column after the australian grand prix </s>
<s> but i wonder if he lacks a killer instinct in wheeltowheel racecraft </s>
<s> if vettel had been defending from hamilton on the last lap  and certainly if he had been defending against either of the two red bulls  im sure he would have faced some sort of attack down the inside </s>
<s> daniel ricciardo has shown time and again that he is willing to lunge up the inside of anybody none more notable than against bottas in the us grand prix last year </s>
<s> in that race ricciardo threw the car down the inside from an unfathomable distance </s>
<s> at the first attempt the australian ran off the track and bottas repassed but next time ricciardo made it stick </s>
<s> bottas had the chance to do the same to vettel in bahrain </s>
<s> in short bottas isnt good enough for mercedeswhy bottas should have gone for itim not a fan of big runoff areas on these modern circuits but one of the benefits is if you go into a corner too hot you can just run wide and return to the track </s>
<s> in many cases this is frustrating to watch as a fan and the drivers also prefer the challenge of having gravel or barriers closer where mistakes get punished </s>
<s> but if bottas had committed down the inside he either would have emerged from turn one with the lead and the win or he would have gone in too deep and ended up having vettel slide back underneath him and ultimately finished second </s>
<s> at least that way he would know he had given it a go </s>
<s> the only way such a move would end in tears is if he was halfhearted and stuck just a nose down the inside </s>
<s> thats where collisions so often happen </s>
<s> note how few times ricciardo actually makes contact with another driver despite his amazing overtaking bravado </s>
<s> he commits so heavily to his moves that they either come off or he overshoots the corner too much and loses the place again </s>
<s> theres so rarely a halfhearted attempt from him and id say hes the true master of the art </s>
<s> once shy many times bitten </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> drivers earn reputations in f1 in wheeltowheel racing </s>
<s> as a driver you take into account who it is you are fighting with before deciding to defend attack chop or lunge </s>
<s> for example i always knew if i was fighting someone like kevin magnussen he would be an extremely tough opponent and not give an inch even when we were teammatesmagnussen had another fantastic weekend finishing in a welldeserved fifth place but yet again got stuck in having contact with renaults nico hulkenberg on lap one before more with toro rossos pierre gasly on the restart after the virtual safety car </s>
<s> he was perhaps slightly lucky to get away with both of those with a car still intact but these moments cement his reputation as a feisty racer and people are a bit more cautious about passing him as a result </s>
<s> fernando alonso of course is another example of a driver you know will never cede a position without giving 110 to hang on to it if at all possible </s>
<s> and if you see a red bull in your mirrors you know they will have a lunge as soon as possible because of the nature of their two aggressive drivers </s>
<s> that means you sometimes defend unnecessarily and end up getting distracted looking too much in your mirrors handing the advantage straight to them </s>
<s> i feel bottas has the reverse effect in f1 at the moment </s>
<s> yes hes had a few scrapes most notably with countryman kimi raikkonen but hes seen as something of a soft touch in wheeltowheel fighting </s>
<s> drivers are throwing moves down the inside of him that they wouldnt try on hamilton in the other mercedes for example because they know bottas would rather let them through than risk a crash </s>
<s> of course this is true to some extent with most drivers in championship contention but the others simply drive a bit closer to that risk </s>
<s> bottas nonattempt at a move on the final lap may have been borne out of a natural caution and a willingness to finish second which many others around him wouldnt have </s>
<s> he made matters worse by being caught in two minds and ending up in the middle of the road into turn one making his exit harder and letting vettel off the hook at turn four as well the next best overtaking place on the circuit </s>
<s> bottas is an incredibly talented driver but if he is to really take the fight to those around him i feel he needs a bit more bite in the heat of battle </s>
<s> his bahrain weekend shows he has the pace to win races and fight with the best </s>
<s> he now has a strong haul of 18 points after two races and that keeps him within reach of the championship protagonists </s>
<s> but perhaps it could have been seven more from bahrain and more from melbourne as well if he had made more progress from 15th on the grid </s>
<s> considering hamiltons ability to hustle vettel in australia its conceivable bottas could perhaps have done more </s>
<s> having said that its early stages in the season and at least the pace bottas showed and his charge at the end will give him confidence heading to china this weekend </s>
<s> vettel at his best </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> hamilton and vettel have won seven out of the last eight championships between themif vettels victory in melbourne two weeks ago was somewhat fortuitous bahrain was a heroic drive </s>

<s> harrington recalls carnoustie triumph </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when padraig harrington talks about the storied 18th hole at carnoustie he sounds like a man describing some of kind of medieval torture chamber a seventh circle of hell reserved for golfers </s>
<s> out of bounds left off the tee water left water right water short bunkers straight in front of you he explains </s>
<s> all the complications off the tee that you can possibly think of </s>
<s> the second shot you can hit the green and go out of bounds </s>
<s> weve seen that many times </s>
<s> its the most difficult closing hole in major championship golf and probably in world golf </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i could play it 100 times in a row and still be as nervous and excited on the 100th attempt as i was on the first </s>
<s> harrington was back in carnoustie on tuesday sizing the place up ahead of the return of the open in july and sharing some stories of the day in 2007 when he won his first claret jug here in a playoff with sergio garcia </s>
<s> what turbulence he went through that afternoon </s>
<s> it was the first time in my life that i felt embarrassed on the golf course and the first time in my life that i won a major championship he recalls </s>
<s> all sorts went on </s>
<s>  catalogue of carnage at carnoustieif you want to present a case for carnoustie being the most brutal test in major golf then harrington is a key witness but far from the only witness </s>
<s> the closing stretch that murderously difficult run from 15 through to 18 has traumatised the worlds best from its first staging of the open more than 80 years ago </s>
<s> jean de velde in 1999 is and always will be the poster boy for carnousties destructiveness but there are so many others </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the open jean van de veldes 18th hole disasterin 1931 when the open was first staged there carnoustieborn mac smith just needed to par his way in from 16 to win </s>
<s> double bogey on 16 and another double on 17 ended his hopes </s>
<s> i felt rather as if i had gone to see a man hanged wrote bernard darwin the doyen of golf writers of the time </s>

<s> when somebody comes into the house and sees the claret jugs theres a reverence towards them he says </s>
<s> theyre looking over at them and i can see theyre looking and i can see they want a picture </s>
<s> its a really nice reminder of what it means </s>
<s> its one of the joys of life that people get excited about it </s>
<s> i had the uspga trophy but everybody pushes it aside to get a picture with the claret jug </s>

<s> amid all the talk of estrangement in the wake of patrick reeds masters victory there emerged another tale of separation to fascinate followers of professional golf </s>

<s> celebrating with the crowds after taking mainz 05 to their first season in the bundesligahe died aged 62 in 2013 but despite having very little success in terms of trophies or titles frank is credited with inspiring a renaissance in the bundesliga that has inspired a new generation of managers including germany coach joachim low as well as klopp </s>
<s> when i started i wasnt learning anything about football that i like </s>
<s> it was all about how can we get the points says klopp </s>
<s> wolfgang frank inspired me not with his ideas of passionate football but much more with his organisation </s>
<s> how to set up a team so you dont lose because when i first became a manager we lost a lot of games </s>
<s> it wasnt about entertaining or a case of lets play football we can fall in love with but about organisation which is always the base from where you get the freedom to be brave </s>
<s>  frank sowed the seeds for the style of play known as gegenpressing which in its simplest form effectively decrees that you have to win the ball back as quickly as possible once you have lost it </s>
<s> he played a back four without a sweeper  extremely unusual in germany  and deliberately defended narrowly in certain areas of the pitch </s>
<s> frank worked on the idea that your opponent was at its most vulnerable when it has just won the ball and was looking to do something positive with it </s>
<s> his teams would leave one or two players unmarked encouraging the person in possession to pass to them </s>
<s> it was a trap waiting to be sprung </s>
<s> his tactics were an epiphany for klopp who was impressed by how everybody had to go where the ball was </s>
<s> the aim was to create numerical superiority to win the ball then sprawl out like a fist that opens </s>
<s> sound familiar </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> borussia dortmund fans say thank you to their departing manageri asked klopp if it is effectively organised chaos </s>
<s> he laughed but his answer is serious </s>
<s> organised chaos sounds good always assuming the organised bit is coming from our team and the chaos from the opposition he said </s>
<s> you can only do these sort of things when you have good enough players </s>
<s> the best coaches in the world do the things the players have given them the opportunity to do </s>
<s>  armed with franks tactics and a passion and commitment that has won the unswerving love of players directors and supporters wherever he has coached klopp took mainz to the german top flight for the first time in their history in 2004 </s>
<s> he was at the club seven years the same amount of time he spent at his next club borussia dortmund where he won five trophies including two bundesliga titles </s>
<s> it is the same period that if everything goes well he says privately he plans to be in liverpool </s>
<s> my wife said liverpool is for youliverpool who appointed klopp in october 2015 were drawn against his former employers dortmund in the quarter finals of the 2016 europa league </s>
<s> a 11 firstleg draw was a precursor to what many still feel is the greatest game ever played in the competition as liverpool fought back from 31 down at anfield in the second leg to win 43 </s>
<s> matched only in drama by what happened in istanbul klopp started halftime by showing the players some videos of what had gone wrong in their firsthalf performance and then he gave a rousing speech that referenced liverpools dramatic turnaround against ac milan in turkey </s>
<s> klopps managerial statsclubyears managedwinsdrawslossesmainz 05200120081097883borussia dortmund200820121796970liverpool2015present814429klopp told the players to create something that we could tell our grandchildren one day and according to liverpool striker divock origi the managers aggression from the touchline in the second half made a huge difference </s>
<s> germany defender mats hummels later admitted dortmund started bricking ourselves at the sight of klopp creating a positive atmosphere in the ground </s>
<s> liverpool were beaten by sevilla in the final but by then the marriage between klopp and the anfield clubs fans was established </s>
<s> klopp is an unashamed lover of what is described in germany as the english game </s>
<s> physical and uncompromising heavy metal football is also described using the german word geil by klopp in raphael honigsteins biography of his compatriot </s>
<s> it comes with the suggestion that selfsacrificing toil could be a sensual arousing experience </s>
<s> the kop has totally bought into this concept </s>
<s> phil thompson who spent 13 years at anfield recently interviewed klopp for liverpool tv </s>
<s> klopp told him that it was wife who said to him jurgen if liverpool fc come for you that is for you </s>

<s> manic celebration after a late win against norwich in 2016 and the glasses were gonethompson added he comes in he understands the people the people understand him they see his passion and i think that is a very very important part of what it is to be part of this club </s>
<s> there is an english core to klopps squad with jordan henderson james milner alex oxladechamberlain adam lallana trent alexanderarnold joe gomez nathaniel clyne dominic solanke and danny ings joined by other bright young british talents such as scotlands andrew robertson and wales ben woodburn </s>
<s> surprisingly  albeit partly because of injuries  there are only two liverpool players in england manager gareth southgates world cup squad </s>
<s> they have thunderous weapons in attack while klopp added composure in defence when he brought in netherlands defender virgil van dijk in january a signing that helped the side finish fourth in the premier league and reach the champions league final </s>
<s> the final it will be a huge struggleklopp will now try to do with liverpool what he came so close to achieving with former club dortmund </s>
<s> victory against madrid would be the culmination of the meeting he had in the law offices of his new employers on 1 october 2015 when he told them liverpool should and could be a regular force in europe </s>
<s> he added that his aim was not just to get them back to that elite level but to transform them into the kind of team noone wanted to face </s>
<s> job done or at least part of it </s>

<s> we will do the very best we can </s>
<s> we are in a good place at the moment and everyone knows how much i appreciate the efforts our fans are about to make to be a part of this party </s>
<s> as our chat comes to an end i ask him how he can prepare to face an unpredictable team like real madrid who offered up more than a dozen good chances against bayern munich in their semifinal yet still went through </s>

<s> derby county were beaten in the playoffs for the third time in six seasonsfollow live text coverage of aston villa v fulham on saturday from 1300 bst kickoff 1700you get tests in life and its how you bounce back </s>
<s> manager gary rowett did his best to remain stoic after his derby county side were beaten in their playoff semifinal by fulham  the rams third failure at this stage in six seasons </s>
<s> and history shows it will not be easy for derby to end up in the top six again next term because in the seasons following their 201314 and 201516 playoff defeats the team finished eighth and ninth </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so is the postplayoff dip a common problem for teams in order to find out we studied 30 years of the english football league knockout format which began in the 198687 season </s>
<s> we also spoke to manager danny wilson who has experienced the highs and lows of playoffs and a sports psychologist to understand why some teams find it difficult to pick themselves up </s>
<s> the findings </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> up to and including the 201617 season the hankies have come out for 252 teams who have had their dreams shattered at the playoff stage </s>
<s> and it seems the postplayoff dip is an issueof the 252 teams 142 56 </s>
<s> 3 did worse the following season with 14 relegated </s>
<s> 51 reached the playoffs again 20 </s>
<s> 2 </s>
<s> another 15 were promoted via the playoffs </s>
<s> 44 teams achieved automatic promotion </s>
<s> in total 23 </s>
<s> 4 bounced back to win promotion the following season </s>
<s> simon gleave head of analysis at gracenote sports has looked specifically at the record of losing playoff finalists16 of the 93 beaten finalists 17 have gone up automatically the following season </s>
<s> reading in 2002 and 2012 are the only team to achieve the feat twice </s>
<s> just under a third 29 have reached the playoffs again the following season </s>
<s> exeter city who play coventry in mondays league two final were the only one of last seasons three beaten finalists to reach the playoffs this season </s>
<s> 27 28 have finished bottom half of the table but avoided relegation while eight clubs 9 have suffered the ignominy of going from the brink of promotion to relegation </s>
<s> leyton orient 2015 were the last team to go from wembley one may to desolation the next </s>
<s> so almost 60 of those who failed to achieve promotion via the playoffs have found it difficult to replicate that feat in the subsequent campaign </s>
<s> why is thatyou can overanalyse failurewhen the playoffs dont pay offmost final defeatssheffield united  reading 4most unsuccessful participationspreston north end 9most participations without making the finalnottingham forest  mk dons 4most participations without winning finalbrentford  sheffield united 8michael caulfield a sports psychologist who has worked with league clubs suggested players might find it hard to recharge after what they considered a season of failure </s>
<s> he told bbc sport the sheer sense of disappointment and then thinking all you need to do as a team is turn up and try again is an issue </s>
<s> for a new challenge you will need renewed energy from those who havent been affected by the past disappointment  its a very delicate social balance clubs play with here </s>
<s> it is important for players to primarily recognise and recall why they have had such a good season because they might not see that they have done so well as they will regard it as a failure </s>
<s> i would suggest a complete and utter break from that thinking about what went wrong  professionals often get so emotionally attached to football they can end up overanalysing it </s>
<s> make sure players are in the right frame of mind </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> danny wilson has twice suffered playoff final heartache as a manager  his swindon town side fell to a 10 defeat by millwall in the 2010 league one final before his sheffield united team were beaten by huddersfield town on penalties in 2012 </s>
<s> he told bbc sport there were many factors  including having the right state of mind  which dictated how a team would react </s>
<s> i think more than anything confidence is key he said </s>
<s> it also depends on the strength of the squad </s>
<s> you might have to look at player recruitment in the summer  that will have some bearing as to where you are going to finish the season after </s>
<s> it is also a big test in preseason to make sure everyone comes back in the right frame of mind or certainly starts in the right frame of mind after that first week or so </s>
<s> it is about trying to pick the players up </s>

<s> saracens are almost at their best defending waiting to pounce on the smallest of mistakes </s>
<s> but equally theyre now more potent with the ball from anywhere on the field </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> theyve gone from being a side that was very defensive three or four seasons ago to a side that has opened up their offence </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> statistically theyre probably the most potent in the premiership with the most clean breaks </s>
<s> a high percentage of those result in either tries or penalties </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> saracens are a clinical side </s>
<s> exeter are a progressive side </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> exeter are working on their execution sometimes it doesnt go quite right </s>
<s> but director of rugby rob baxter backs them to get it right </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> against a saracens side who are so clinical who could puncture your defence three or four times and score four tries in quick succession  with farrell potentially kicking 20odd points  that could be a tough train to stop </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> exeter will know their game has to be at their very best while saracens dont always have to be at their very best </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> they know they are very difficult to beat with a strategy that sees them take their time when they enter an opponents 22 </s>
<s> they like to build and then they suck it in and pickandgo pickandgo </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> box office back rows come facetoface </s>
<s> billy vunipola against sam simmonds in the meeting of the two number eights should really show us why billy is the number one choice in an england shirt for that position </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> simmonds is a brilliant club player </s>
<s> as brief as hes been a regular for chiefs hes had a great impact </s>
<s> hes like an openside flanker playing at number eight </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> hes not stepped immediately into that international position </s>
<s> theres more power required there </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> if you dont have that power at six and seven which he has at exeter it allows him as a smaller quicker man to be able to play at eight </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> sam simmonds against billy vunipola in premiership final headtohead </s>
<s> with don armand and dave ewers alongside in the chiefs back row they can do the donkeywork some big carrying allowing simmonds to play on the edge </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> not that he cant work in congestion hes better in space </s>
<s> in tight situations he can use his quick feet </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its one of those weird anomalies where hes so good at club level but at the moment average internationally </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but hes new and i critique him harshly because of what hes up against internationally </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when you look at the likes of billy vunipola they step into the england team and it seems like another game in another shirt where they have the same presence and now with added experience  theyre world class </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> simmonds has the same impact in a club game so hes going to be an influential figure on the final for sure </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> can we learn anything from the last two playoff encounters </s>
<s> their previous meetings in the past two seasons playoff games victory for saracens in the 2016 final a win for exeter in the 2017 semifinal just gives this final more experience </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> for me the experience of the big time is with saracens </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> exeter have arrived at the big time and with victory on saturday they rubberstamped that entry into the big time </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> saracens are already in the big time and for four or five seasons theyve always been challenging for silverware </s>
<s> exeter have done it on a domestic level for the past three seasons </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> exeter beat saracens in the 2017 premiership semifinal </s>
<s> a lastditch sam simmonds try gave exeter victory against saracens in last seasons premiership semifinal </s>
<s> with the big match temperament and experience on saracens side they will be favourites in many peoples eyes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it will be an explosive game because some of these guys are going on tour together the following week </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> exeter flanker don armand isnt going to south africa and will be hoping to show eddie jones hes made a mistake </s>
<s> simmonds will want to show that he can live against these big back rows </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> henry slade and jack nowell for exeter are matchwinners in short spaces of time </s>
<s> winger olly woodburn has had a tremendous season yet again with a number of tries </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the chiefs back line has to make it their day because the consistency of the likes of farrell brad barritt alex lozowski chris wyles sean maitland and alex goode for saracens is irresistible </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> theyre like the domestic equivalent of new zealand on their day </s>
<s> as good as exeter can play right now their best is not as good as saracens </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> that doesnt mean exeter cant win </s>
<s> its a question of taking the opportunities when they present themselves and when youve made them </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> prediction saracens to win by 710 points </s>
<s> saracens scrumhalf ben spencer celebrates his semifinal try against wasps </s>
<s> ben spencer ran in the last of saracens six semifinal tries against wasps </s>
<s> i see saracens winning a very hardfought game </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i think it will be explosive and exciting particularly if the weather stays as it has been for the past week </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a dry sunny day makes it potentially more exciting makes you feel you can play your best rugby in the best stadium with huge support </s>
<s> it lifts you to improve on what youve done throughout the rest of the season </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it will be a wonderful spectacular game a wonderful advert for premiership rugby and a great endorsement for the competition </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> saracens are at their potent best and i think overall they will keep coming </s>
<s> exeter will also do the same but i think that big match experience for saracens will bring them out as winners </s>

<s> chris ashton i can still play for england says toulon wing </s>

<s> chris ashton </s>
<s> ashton will line up against england for the barbarians at twickenham on sunday </s>
<s> toulon winger chris ashton says he has not given up yet on his england career and has vowed to make an impression for the barbarians at twickenham on sunday </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the 31yearold who broke the top 14 tryscoring record this season has not played for his country under current coach eddie jones </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the former saracens player won his last england cap in 2014 and is unavailable for selection while playing in france </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in my head england has never gone away ashton told rugby union weekly </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> im always looking to prove people wrong </s>
<s> i would like to think i still could do it </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> pod on tour with chris ashton and the barbarians </s>
<s> ashton scored 19 tries in 39 tests between 2010 and 2014 for england but was dropped before the 2015 world cup </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> jones recalled the back to the england setup at the start of 2016 before a 10week suspension ruled him out of the six nations </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> he then missed out on englands tour of australia in the summer of 2016 an omission which still lingers and was banned for 13 weeks in september 2016 for biting </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the bans changed the course of my career ashton said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> at times i thought i was very close to getting back in and i would like to think if i had i would have changed eddie jones opinion of me </s>
<s> but that opportunity just didnt come for whatever reason </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i am in the situation i am now but i felt i gave it my best even before i went to france </s>
<s> the one that sticks with me is the summer tour to australia </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i had just got man of the match in the premiership semifinal and we had just won the european cup </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> eddie calls and i have a missed call on my phone </s>
<s> i thought ill ring him back in a minute and hell tell me im going </s>
<s>  i rang him back and he said youre not going </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> obviously eddie is at the highest level hes the coach and if hes not on your side anything else is irrelevant </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i was just desperate to get in there and change his mind which im still convinced i could do </s>
<s> id be kidding myself if i didnt think i could still play for england </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> barbarians game a great opportunity </s>
<s> ashton is part of a starladen barbarians squad for sundays match with england at twickenham and the former wigan rugby league player hopes to make the most of his return to the home of english rugby </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> im looking for ways to keep the lads sober this week he added </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its such a good opportunity for me its the closest im going to get to playing for england right now </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so ill take it with both hands </s>
