<s> youth shines bright for northern ireland on gold coastcommonwealth games has gold coast 2018 proved sport and politics can mix </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> by dan roan </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bbc sports editor </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> from the sectioncommonwealth games </s>
<s> share this page </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> homophobia is massive in sport  daley </s>
<s> the 2018 commonwealth games will be remembered for many moments of drama but arguably its most important legacy will be in helping to bring about a shift in the way sport sees its role in wider society </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is often said sport and politics should never really mix </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> recent examples include foreign secretary boris johnsons incendiary comparison between this summers world cup in russia and the 1936 berlin olympics in nazi germany </s>
<s> extreme yes but it was also a stark reminder of the controversy whenever politics is accused of exploiting sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> advertisement </s>
<s> because despite such global events being so inescapably political sport invariably tries its best to pretend the two worlds are somehow kept separate </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> just look at some of the rhetoric used in recent weeks </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> former england footballer sol campbell  now a fifa ambassador  visited volgograd one of world cup 2018s host cities and was asked about britains diplomatic boycott of the event after russias alleged involvement in the poisoning of former spy sergei skripal </s>
<s> campbell replied that sport and politics were almost different galaxies </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> many believe qatars hosting of the next world cup in 2022 is just as political as vladimir putins in russia </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there is talk qatar might come under pressure to share the tournament given the current diplomatic crisis with its neighbours </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but tournament chief hassan althawadis response that the world cup would never be used as a political tool </s>
<s> we believe in separating politics from sports and elevating sports from politics he told ap </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what of manchester city manager pep guardiolas yellow ribbon on the touchline in support of imprisoned politicians in catalonia we dont want political symbols in football said football association chief executive martin glenn </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> on and on </s>
<s> and this sentiment is mirrored in us sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> our playing field is not the place for political statements said houston texans owner bob mcnair when asked about nfl players kneeling anthem protests </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so when set against such a backdrop this years commonwealth games on the gold coast will perhaps be remembered as groundbreaking </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> because rather than shy away from the political issues that have inevitably arisen during the two weeks of competition organisers have embraced them </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> watch england shock australia to win lastgasp netball gold </s>
<s> follow live coverage of the commonwealth games final day </s>
<s> before the action got under way commonwealth games federation chief david grevemberg told me of his hope that the event would provide a fantastic opportunity to magnify awareness of a host of issues to take advocacy positions and connect athletes and sports with the social change agenda from human rights lgbt rights and climate change to female empowerment and indigenous reconciliation </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this is a watershed moment for all of these causes and the commonwealth is so well positioned because of the complexity of its shared history its idealism and some of the challenges and opportunities that it faces right now he said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we absolutely want to be trailblazers for a new movement in sports </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> were starting to see a number of these things play out in terms of athletes commitments to different causes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> british diving champion tom daley showed precisely what grevemberg meant </s>
<s> his challenge to the 37 competing nations that still criminalise homosexuality made headlines around the world </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> daleys comments apply a degree of pressure to the games authorities </s>
<s> after all all potential host cities are obliged to uphold the uns guiding principles on human rights taking meaningful action to ensure equality and inclusivity </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so does this mean that a potential host for the 2026 games kuala lumpur in malaysia for instance where homosexuality is banned would not currently be considered rather than shy away from such a contentious issue as some sports administrators might grevemberg welcomes the debate </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the cgf will not prevent cities from bidding he told me </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> rather as part of the bid process we will work with them to look at their local context and laws and consider how they promote protect and respect human rights </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> by way of example samoa and the bahamas hosts of the last two commonwealth youth games did not have child safeguarding standards in place </s>
<s> we worked with unicef to instigate change and as a result both changed their policy and national legislation to address safeguarding in major events </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there have been other examples of the games relevance when it comes to social impact these past two weeks </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> from organisers encouraging the rwandan womens beach volleyball team to wear black armbands to mark the 24th anniversary of the tutsi genocide to the prominent celebration of australias indigenous culture in the opening ceremony </s>
<s> this was met with opposition in some quarters but was a deliberate attempt not to swerve the race issues that australian society continues to wrestle with </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> commonwealth games gold coast 2018 opens with glittering show </s>
<s> from the federations support of new zealands controversial transgender weightlifter laurel hubbard  despite opposition from some of her rivals  to gold coast 2018s status as the first multidiscipline sports event ever to award an equal number of medals to men and women </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> as prominent australian journalist tracey holmes noted the games has represented a determined effort to take sport out of its selfimposed quarantine </s>
<s> the federation she remarked was that rarest of breeds  a sports body that embraces politics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> some have said we have been too political with our strong stance towards equality and inclusivity acknowledges grevemberg </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but its not about politics it is about humanity </s>
<s> that is what we commonwealth sport are about </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> these are important messages for the games leaders to get across of course at a time when they are having to justify themselves their relevance their legacy and their cost </s>
<s> a few months after just two cities  both british  bid for the 2022 games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> amid the ongoing concern about a lack of funding for british basketball it has been announced 70m will be spent upgrading the alexander stadium for birmingham 2022 an event set to cost more than 750m but which organisers say will be transformational for the west midlands </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> gold coast 2018 was not perfect games bosses have questions to answer over the delay in getting help to the stricken scottish runner callum hawkins in the marathon </s>
<s> melissa lowther was critical of them too for punishing her instead of team england over the administrative debacle that cost her a place in the cycling time trial </s>
<s> and the organising committee apologised after broadcasters were unable to show athletes entering the stadium for the closing ceremony </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but the commonwealth games federation insists the past two weeks have allowed this symbol of britains colonial past to assert a muchneeded new identity  sport with a social conscience </s>
<s> and that positive discussions have already begun with potential hosts for the 2026 and 2030 games </s>
<s> those who stage the games it says will now be investing in a brand that aims to leave a lasting impact on the community in some way </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> indeed bbc sport understands even the international olympic committee  having traditionally seen the commonwealth games as something of an irrelevance  has been in touch with officials indicating it could learn from the federations social programme as it seeks to improve its image amid continuing fallout from the russian doping crisis </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the debate around whether such events are really worth what they cost is set to continue but at least gold coast 2018 has shown in a way rarely seen before that sport need not be so afraid of the outside world </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and at a time when sports bodies are having to repair their reputations after a series of scandals and controversies that could be just as important a legacy as the medals that have been won </s>

<s> commonwealth games road racer simmonds claims bronze in womens time trial </s>
<s> englands hayley simmonds claimed commonwealth games bronze in the womens time trial and tears of joy quickly followed the latest high in a remarkable transition </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the 29yearold stood on the podium next to new zealands linda villumsen and australias gold medallist katrin garfoot weighing almost half as much as she did when her cycling journey began in 2010 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what started as a way of lowering a peak weight of around 16st 5lbs 104kg has led to a major podium not to mention a drop of around seven stone 45kg </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she is a picture of sporting achievement yet says she remembers vividly the days where she would hide in baggy clothes to conceal her physique </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> commonwealth games time trial </s>
<s> simmonds 29 switched from rowing to cycling in 2010 </s>
<s> simmonds embodied change as  hunched over her bike in the aerotuck position  she set about adding bronze to the silver englands harry tanfield claimed earlier in the mens time trial </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> bye bye malt loaf and pasta </s>
<s> life changed for simmonds after she competed for cambridge as they claimed the boat race in 2009 </s>
<s> the 5am rise to row before lectures stopped as her sporting nature was entirely sacrificed for study </s>
<s> added weight soon followed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i wouldnt say i got away with it when i was rowing </s>
<s> when i did the boat race even at weighin day i was 86kg 13st 7lbs i think added simmonds who has a phd in organic chemistry </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i used to eat a lot of pasta and cheese  which is nice but not ideal </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i think nutrition has come a long way in the time i have been in sport </s>
<s> when i was rowing in school we had a nutrition talk and i remember being told that when ive been out on a long row i can basically buy an entire malt loaf and eat it </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> veggies </s>

<s> work with michelinstarred chef and nutritionist alan murchison has helped simmonds drop down to around nine stone </s>
<s> carbohydrate intake has been drastically reduced in preference for a highprotein glutenfree diet </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> at one point when i was trying to lose weight i would have a highprotein breakfast added simmonds </s>
<s> so that might be steak and nuts </s>
<s> i dont do that anymore </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> initially you can lose weight quite quickly and then its a slow process </s>
<s> so within the period of losing weight i have changed what i have done </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i feel more confident and better in myself </s>
<s> i dont worry about wearing baggy clothes to hide anymore </s>
<s> even just general energy levels have transformed </s>
<s> its hard to remember those times now </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> lose an ounce gain a second </s>
<s> and then of course there is cyclings part in the lifestyle switch </s>
<s> her husband and coach mark holt gave her a bike in 2010 before training seriously a year later and achieving a sub 30minute time trial close to her home </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> simmonds cries at the finish </s>
<s> simmonds was incredibly emotional as she discovered she had claimed the bronze medal </s>
<s> with a mantra of lose an ounce gain a second she eventually won the british national time trial championships in 2015 the same year in which she clocked 19 minutes and 46 seconds for the distance </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> threehour morning rides or sessions on the turbo trainer twice a day have melted away mass from her 5ft 5in frame </s>
<s> to stand next to simmonds now you wonder how she actually carried the extra weight </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> as soon as i started cycling and doing evening time trials my competitive nature took over added the redditchborn athlete </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> commonwealth games time trial </s>
<s> australias katrin garfoot produced a dominant display to win gold with linda villumsen of new zealand in second </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there have been times where i just wanted to go and eat a big cake but im lucky i have people supporting me </s>
<s> if im going for that slice of cake my husband may say do you really need that </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> anyone can do it </s>
<s> it doesnt matter if your goal is a 30minute time trial just little regular goals </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> making the commonwealth podium is hardly a little goal </s>
<s> simmonds admitted the sense of achievement felt incredible but she is already looking to make the british team at the 2020 olympic games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there is now no more weight to really lose but given the focus which has brought her this far reaching the sporting carnival in tokyo two years from now would be another turn in simmonds transformation </s>

<s> theres a lot to take in at the commonwealth games </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> 1 </s>
<s> is there actually an age limit on competitors </s>
<s> wales 11yearold table tennis player anna hursey is one of the commonwealth games youngest ever competitors </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> shes also the youngest player ever to represent wales at a senior level in any sport </s>

<s> undefined thumbnail </s>
<s> 1 min </s>

<s> at the other end of the spectrum theres canadas 79yearold full bore shooter robert pitcairn  the oldest ever competitor at the games </s>
<s> he also once foiled a hijacker on a flight so theres that </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so could you technically enter the games as say a 90yearold sprinter or a fiveyearold cyclist </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> each sport has an international federation and that body sets age limits in their sport chris jenkins from commonwealth games wales told bbc three </s>
<s> for example mountain biking is 21 but track cycling is lower </s>
<s> table tennis does not have an age limit while gymnastics has an age limit of 16 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> both the olympics and commonwealth games leave decisions on age limits to the individual sports bodies who are best able to assess risks and suitability </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> 2 </s>
<s> why do they give out green cards in hockey </s>
<s> green card hockeygettyimages </s>
<s> havent watched any hockey since the olympics confused as to why the ref keeps showing those green cards </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a green card is a warning and can entail a temporary suspension for two minutes of playing time </s>
<s> a yellow card can result in the offending player being temporarily suspended for a minimum of five minutes while the red card is for more serious offences </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> well there you know now </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> 3 </s>
<s> dont they have to wear protective head gear in the boxing events </s>
<s> these vou siutu of australia and frazer clarke of england compete during the mens 91kg quarterfinal boxinggettyimages </s>
<s> nope </s>
<s> the 2014 commonwealth games were the first time since 1982 that male boxers competed without head guards </s>
<s> the reasoning came from research showing there had actually been an increase in the number of head injuries since head gear was introduced to amateur boxing prior to the 1984 los angeles olympic games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when you have a head guard on you are more likely to get an injury explains dr mike loosemore lead consultant in sport and exercise medicine at the institute of sport exercise  health </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there are several reasons for this it could be that head guards restrict your vision slightly so you dont see the punches coming and maybe that the head guard increases the size of the head </s>
<s> but the most likely reason is people just feel more confident with a head guard on </s>
<s> they dont put their head in a position where it cant get hit </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> commonwealth games meet the oldest athlete in events history </s>
<s> by laura savvas </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bbc sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> from the sectioncommonwealth games </s>
<s> share this page </s>
<s> robert pitcairn </s>
<s> at 79 years and nine months robert pitcairn is not only the oldest athlete in this years games  hes also the oldest in the history of the games </s>
<s> youve probably heard all about 11yearold anna hursey the youngest competitor at this years commonwealth games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> now meet 79yearold full bore shooter robert pitcairn </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> whos about to become your favourite story of the event </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> born in 1938  somewhat fittingly in the same month the first superman comic was released  canadian robert is not only this years oldest competitor but hes also the proud owner of the oldest athlete in the history of the games title </s>
<s> so hes a pretty big deal </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> robert pitcairn </s>
<s> hes entered the history books as the oldest commonwealth game sathlete ever </s>
<s> i feel honoured to set the new age record and grateful my health and athleticism made it possible for me to be competitive in the gold coast games pitcairn said after a training session at the belmont shooting centre </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> at 79 years and nine months old his debut at the games on monday will break the record previously held by englands doreen flanders who took part in lawn bowls at glasgow 2014 a few weeks after her 79th birthday </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> roberts quest to compete started in 1960 after he was introduced to shooting as an air force cadet </s>
<s> however he was not able to be a serious contender for the commonwealth games until his retirement in 1998 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i feel honoured to set the new age record and grateful that my health and athleticism made it possible for me to be competitive in the gold coast games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> robert pitcairn </s>
<s> the oldest athlete in the history of the games </s>
<s> after narrowly missing out on a spot for manchester 2002 robert was determined to invest more time in training for the trials for this years games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> during the last national trial he shot flawlessly and grabbed one of two places for the gold coast  an achievement he describes as the pinnacle of my long shooting career </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> now youre probably wondering how he celebrated </s>
<s> well he replaced his 22yearold shooting jacket with a brand new one in his beloved canadian red and white colours </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> robert pitcairn </s>
<s> the talented marksman nabbed the grand aggregate prize in bisley uk at the top international full bore target rifle competition in 1965 </s>
<s> and if the fact hes almost 80 and competing in a commonwealth games isnt enough of a reason to get behind him robert used to be a commercial pilot and is well known for his heroic past </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in 1974 he foiled a hijacker on a 737 he was flying with 120 passengers aboard </s>
<s> as you do </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> hes even shared his expertise with his son donald who is also an accomplished rifle shooter </s>
<s> in fact the pair both competed at the 2011 and 2015 world long range rifle championships </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> robert pitcairn </s>
<s> robert enjoyed every hour of his 24612 fying hours on 65 different types of plane </s>
<s> but robert who turns 80 on 26 june is not satisfied with merely being the oldest athlete in the games history </s>

<s> commonwealth games road racer simmonds claims bronze in womens time trial </s>
<s> englands hayley simmonds claimed commonwealth games bronze in the womens time trial and tears of joy quickly followed the latest high in a remarkable transition </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the 29yearold stood on the podium next to new zealands linda villumsen and australias gold medallist katrin garfoot weighing almost half as much as she did when her cycling journey began in 2010 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what started as a way of lowering a peak weight of around 16st 5lbs 104kg has led to a major podium not to mention a drop of around seven stone 45kg </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she is a picture of sporting achievement yet says she remembers vividly the days where she would hide in baggy clothes to conceal her physique </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> commonwealth games time trial </s>
<s> simmonds 29 switched from rowing to cycling in 2010 </s>
<s> simmonds embodied change as  hunched over her bike in the aerotuck position  she set about adding bronze to the silver englands harry tanfield claimed earlier in the mens time trial </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> i was showing someone photos of me in 2011 and they didnt believe it was me </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> bye bye malt loaf and pasta </s>
<s> life changed for simmonds after she competed for cambridge as they claimed the boat race in 2009 </s>
<s> the 5am rise to row before lectures stopped as her sporting nature was entirely sacrificed for study </s>
<s> added weight soon followed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i wouldnt say i got away with it when i was rowing </s>
<s> when i did the boat race even at weighin day i was 86kg 13st 7lbs i think added simmonds who has a phd in organic chemistry </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i used to eat a lot of pasta and cheese  which is nice but not ideal </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i think nutrition has come a long way in the time i have been in sport </s>
<s> when i was rowing in school we had a nutrition talk and i remember being told that when ive been out on a long row i can basically buy an entire malt loaf and eat it </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i thought great i like food that sounds good </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> veggies </s>
<s> simmonds often posts pictures of healthy meals on instagram all the greens for dinner tonight chilli spiced chicken kale and red onion with miso roasted broccoli </s>
<s> work with michelinstarred chef and nutritionist alan murchison has helped simmonds drop down to around nine stone </s>
<s> carbohydrate intake has been drastically reduced in preference for a highprotein glutenfree diet </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> at one point when i was trying to lose weight i would have a highprotein breakfast added simmonds </s>
<s> so that might be steak and nuts </s>
<s> i dont do that anymore </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> initially you can lose weight quite quickly and then its a slow process </s>
<s> so within the period of losing weight i have changed what i have done </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i feel more confident and better in myself </s>
<s> i dont worry about wearing baggy clothes to hide anymore </s>
<s> even just general energy levels have transformed </s>
<s> its hard to remember those times now </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> lose an ounce gain a second </s>
<s> and then of course there is cyclings part in the lifestyle switch </s>
<s> her husband and coach mark holt gave her a bike in 2010 before training seriously a year later and achieving a sub 30minute time trial close to her home </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> simmonds cries at the finish </s>
<s> simmonds was incredibly emotional as she discovered she had claimed the bronze medal </s>
<s> with a mantra of lose an ounce gain a second she eventually won the british national time trial championships in 2015 the same year in which she clocked 19 minutes and 46 seconds for the distance </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> threehour morning rides or sessions on the turbo trainer twice a day have melted away mass from her 5ft 5in frame </s>
<s> to stand next to simmonds now you wonder how she actually carried the extra weight </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> as soon as i started cycling and doing evening time trials my competitive nature took over added the redditchborn athlete </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> commonwealth games time trial </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> if im going for that slice of cake my husband may say do you really need that </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> 2018 french open </s>
<s> venue roland garros paris dates 27 may10 june </s>
<s> coverage daily live radio and text commentaries on bbc radio 5 live and the bbc sport website </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> unmistakeably the french open at roland garros </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the second grand slam of the tennis calendar  and the only major on clay  begins on sunday </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> spains 16time grand slam champion rafael nadal is still the man to beat in paris while 23time major winner serena williams is the star attraction in the womens draw </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however two of the biggest names will not be playing in the french capital  20time grand slam champion roger federer and britains former world number one andy murray </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in murrays absence the british charge will be led by kyle edmund in the mens draw and johanna konta in the womens </s>

<s> heres everything you need to know </s>

<s> is zverev a grand slam champion in the making </s>
<s> live scores schedule and results </s>
<s> alerts get tennis news sent to your phone </s>
<s> who can stop the king of clay </s>
<s> beating nadal on a clay court is the ultimate challenge in tennis  a notion both 12time grand slam champion novak djokovic and threetime grand slam champion murray agree on </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and once again the 31yearold spaniard is the favourite to win at roland garros </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nadal triumphed in paris last year becoming the first player  male or female  to win the same grand slam tournament 10 times in the open era </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> worryingly for his rivals he has picked up where he left off last year on the clay lifting his 11th titles in monte carlo and barcelona on his way to a record 50set winning streak on a single surface </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> eventually that run came to an end in a defeat by dominic thiem in madrid  nadals first loss on clay since the austrian world number eight beat him in rome 12 months previously </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> normal service resumed for the spaniard at the italian open a gutsy threeset victory over germanys inform alexander zverev giving him an eighth title in rome and helping him regain the world number one ranking from longtime rival roger federer </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nevertheless nadal  who begins his defence against ukraines alexandr dolgopolov  deflected talk of lifting the coupe des mousquetaires for an 11th time following his win in rome </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> conditions in paris are completely different he said </s>
<s> i dont believe that what happened even if i lost  even with the victory  creates a big impact about what can happen in paris </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> wheres federer </s>
<s> roger federer will not play at the french open </s>
<s> federer waved au revoir until the summer following his miami open defeat in march </s>
<s> for the second year running federer  who turns 37 in august  has decided to skip the entire claycourt season </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when announcing his decision last year he spoke about the need to be smart with his scheduling to prolong his career and the french open  on his least favourite surface and a tournament which he has won only once in 2009  has been sacrificial </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the decision proved to be a sensible one last year as a refreshed federer returned to the court for the grass season going on to lift a record eighth wimbledon title </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the swiss maestro regained the world number one ranking in february after a blistering start to the year in which he claimed the australian open during a 17match winning run </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but successive defeats  by juan martin del potro in the indian wells final followed by a shock loss against injuryhit australian thanasi kokkinakis  preceded the announcement federer would again skip roland garros </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> federer has not played in paris since 2015 leading to some suggestions  including from his old rival  that he does not fancy meeting nadal on clay </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> edmund ready for first slam as britains top man </s>
<s> kyle edmund </s>
<s> edmund ranked 17th has broken into the worlds top 20 for the first time </s>
<s> with murray still not fully recovered from hip surgery edmund goes into his first grand slam as the british number one </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is the first slam since the 2006 us open where threetime major champion murray has not been ranked as the countrys leading player </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> of course edmund has played on the biggest stage without murrays shadow looming  most notably at the australian open in january </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the 22yearold became only the sixth british man in the open era to reach a grand slam semifinal seeing his remarkable run ended in the last four by croatias 2014 us open champion marin cilic </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> since then the yorkshireman has also beaten 2016 french open champion djokovic in madrid helping him climb into the worlds top 20 for the first time </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> he will begin his campaign against young australian alex de minaur </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> cameron norrie is the only other briton in the mens singles draw </s>
<s> the world number 102 who shot to prominence in the davis cup defeat by spain in march has gained direct entry to a grand slam for the first time and will face germanys peter gojowczyk in the first round </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> who can stop nadal </s>
<s> alexander zverev the man identified by many as nadals biggest threat </s>
<s> the 21yearold german is the leading player on the atp tour this year having won 30 matches and claimed claycourt titles in munich and madrid </s>
<s> however he has never gone past the last 16 of a grand slam </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> marin cilic the powerful croat reached a careerhigh third in the world following his run to the australian open final but has never gone beyond the last eight at roland garros </s>
<s> runs to the monte carlo quarterfinals and rome semifinals however have left the 29yearold hoping he can go deep in the draw in paris </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> novak djokovic the oncedominant serb has dropped down the rankings after an elbow injury which has disrupted his career since wimbledon </s>
<s> he is now ranked 22nd in the world but showed glimpses of returning to his best form with a run to the italian open semifinals this month </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> dominic thiem the one man to have beaten rafael nadal on clay in the past two years </s>
<s> and it is a feat the 24yearold austrian has achieved twice  in rome last year and in madrid earlier this month </s>
<s> he is yet to transfer his talent into major prizes having still not managed to land a masters title although he has reached the roland garros semifinals for two years running </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> stan wawrinka a frustrating year for the 2015 champion who has been sidelined by a knee injury for much of the past year </s>
<s> the 33yearold swiss has reached at least the semifinals in each of the past three years but a lack of time on court means a similar feat this year might be beyond him </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mens seeds </s>
<s> serena out of match practice  but can still win </s>
<s> serena williams </s>
<s> serena williams is aiming for a first grand slam title since having a baby </s>
<s> serena williams has only played four tour matches since returning to the court after giving birth to daughter alexis in september  but that has not stopped coach patrick mouratoglou saying the 23time grand slam champion can still win in paris </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> halep leads the female contenders </s>

<s> winter olympics gbs billy morgan seals historic big air bronze </s>
<s> winter olympics historymaker ester ledecka wins gold in two sports </s>
<s> by katie falkingham </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bbc sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> from the sectionwinter olympics </s>
<s> share this page </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ledecka claims double gold with snowboard slalom victory </s>
<s> what do you do when you cant choose between skiing and snowboarding </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> well if youre ester ledecka you do both </s>
<s> you even take your indecision to olympic level and win double gold </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the 22yearold czech had never even stood on an alpine skiing world cup podium until last saturday morning when she took the greatest prize in the sport stunning even herself to win olympic super g gold </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but her favoured event was still to come and she showed no sign of nerves to add the parallel giant slalom title to her growing collection exactly a week later  becoming the first woman to claim gold medals in two sports at a winter olympics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i thought there must be some mistake i thought theyd switch the times for someone elses ledecka said after her skiing triumph </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she didnt even own the skis on which she raced  her equipment borrowed from giant slalom gold medallist mikaela shiffrin </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but no such inexperience was on show seven days later as she defeated germanys selina joerg to win her second gold of the games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its like being great at badminton and tennis </s>
<s> while the theory is the same the strategy and technique are polar opposites </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ed leigh </s>
<s> ski sunday commentator </s>
<s> daybyday guide to whats on </s>
<s> full schedule and results </s>
<s> shock skiing success </s>
<s> in the super g ledecka denied defending champion anna veith what seemed a certain successive gold by just one hundredth of a second with the austrian having already started to give celebratory interviews </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but not only did she deprive veith of that muchdesired second gold her result pushed back twotime olympic medallist lindsey vonn into sixth after the american  competing at her first olympics since 2010  made a costly mistake </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> noone could have predicted the path the race would take with bbc commentator matt chilton describing ledeckas victory as one of the most astonishing olympic stories of all time </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but it was perhaps vonn who summed it up best saying i wish i had as much athleticism as she has to hop from sport to sport and win everything </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> unfortunately im only good at ski racing and she still beat me </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> already a star in snowboarding </s>
<s> ester ledecka </s>
<s> multitalented ledecka in action on her way to her second gold medal of the games </s>
<s> ledecka only started on the skiing circuit in 2016 with her super g world cup best just 19th  coming in garmischpartenkirchen and lake louise last season  but snowboarding is where its truly at for her </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> as the world champion and with five world cup titles to her name this season the parallel giant slalom is the only event in which youd have expected heavyfavourite ledecka to be winning gold prior to the start of the games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> even silver medallist veith  whose fairytale return from injury was dashed at the very end by ledecka  wasnt aware of her skiing abilities admitting she didnt know how strong the czech was </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ledecka became a double junior world champion in the parallel slalom and parallel giant slalom in 2013 while still at high school before making her olympic debut in sochi the following year </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it was 2015 however when the world really took notice as she was crowned parallel slalom world champion for the first time before adding the parallel giant slalom title to her haul in 2017 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but 2018 has been her best year yet </s>
<s> asked whether her snowboarding prowess helped her before her goldmedal run on skis she said i took confidence from snowboarding </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i was standing at the start and i said to myself this is my dream at the last olympics you were here on just a snowboard now youre here on skis so go do your best run </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> from skiing for snowboard i take the fast speed im not afraid of the speed </s>
<s> i just focus on riding downhill thats all </s>
<s> every time </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ive just got on with it since i was a little child and throughout my career ive had luck in meeting good people and i have a great team </s>
<s> theyre very supportive and professional and maybe thats why im up here right now </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the winners podium from the womens super g </s>
<s> anna veith austria silver ester ledecka czech republic gold and tina weirather liechtenstein bronze on the super g podium </s>
<s> history accomplished </s>
<s> way before her second gold medalwinning run ledecka had already made history in qualification becoming the first athlete to compete in both snowboard and skiing at the olympics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but in climbing to the top step of the podium yet again she has elevated the scale of her feat to another level entirely </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she is the fifth athlete to win in two sports at one games and the first in unrelated events with the previous double wins coming in nordic events </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> today was a big day for snowboard ester she said after winning her second gold </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> today was something very special  ill think about this moment until the end of my life </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but the ledecka family are no strangers to success at the olympics  her grandfather jan klapac won bronze at the 1964 games in innsbruck before winning silver four years later in grenoble for the thenczechoslovakia ice hockey team </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> esters pyeongchang gold medals completes the set for the ledeckas but at just 22 years old you sense there is plenty more to come </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> winter olympics 2018 snowboard specialist ester ledecka shocks rivals to win super g gold </s>
<s> an astonishing achievement  analysis </s>
<s> ski sunday commentator ed leigh its like being great at badminton and tennis </s>
<s> while the theory is the same the strategy and technique are polar opposites </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its not like ester grew up just doing alpine she has always done both codes and has somehow perfected both sports </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> her achievement in the super g was astonishing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bbc sport skiing expert graham bell its probably the best story of these games </s>
<s> its hard enough doing one discipline in alpine skiing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what ester does is she trains three weeks alpine skiing then three weeks snowboarding </s>
<s> she has done that her entire career </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she didnt want to give either up because she loved it so much </s>
<s> it is a massive shock because she has never even placed on a world cup podium </s>
<s> to do two completely different sports is incredible </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> nearly one in three british olympic and paralympic athletes have experienced or witnessed unacceptable behaviour in their elite programme according to a uk sport report </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the culture health check report was commissioned after a series of athlete welfare and bullying scandals </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> more than 90 of athletes and staff said they were proud to be part of their programmes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> yet there were concerns over giving feedback and mental health support </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> almost a third of athletes 31 disagreed they had opportunities to give feedback without fear of negative consequences in their worldclass programme </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> one in six athletes said they had experienced unacceptable behaviour with a similar number saying they had witnessed it but only 24 reported it to their national governing body </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nearly a quarter 24 said they were dissatisfied or very dissatisfied with the measures taken in their sport to optimise the mental health of highperformance athletes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> all sports were invited to take part in the review with 682 athletes responding out of 895 asked </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> uk sport said the results are largely encouraging but acknowledged some clear areas for improvement with a need to enhance feedback address unacceptable behaviour and understand more about mental health </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the findings prove that the majority of the highperformance system is working brilliantly well is valued by the athletes and staff and is enabling them to achieve amazing things in very challenging circumstances uk sport chief executive liz nicholl told bbc sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but every issue raised in a report like this is very serious and every sport will develop an action plan to address its specific issues </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we need to create a system where the quality of the discussion is improved and the athletes feedback is as valued as the coachs advice and support </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> several british sporting governing bodies have been embroiled in controversy around duty of care standards including cycling gymnastics taekwondo paraswimming and parasnowsport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in february the bbc revealed a quarter of britains leading paraathletessaid they did not feel cared about as a person </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in response to thursdays report uk sport announced a new range of initiatives aimed at improving athlete welfare </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the agency will double its funding of the independent british athletes commission bac to 1m before the 2020 tokyo olympics and paralympics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there should be routes for athletes to voice their concerns and be heard ideally within the sport so that concerns can be dealt with early doors added nicholl </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but failing that an athlete needs an effective and supportive bac that they can turn to for independent support and help </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> uk sport says its increased funding for the bac will allow the organisation to have a casework officer in the north and south of the country and provide continuous support rather than just responding to incidents </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a series of roadshows are also being staged around the country linking up current and former athletes with careers advice and workshops </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the report also found there have been improvements in whistleblowing and reporting procedures plus more support around mental and physical health issues </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ian braid the managing director of the independent advisory organisation duty of care in action sport dociasport and former head of the bac said he was pleased about the funding increase </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however the key recommendation in baroness greythompsons duty of care review for the government which stated that the bac should be independentlyfunded has been ignored </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this is a shame as that would have given athletes more confidence in the system and that genuine grievances would be properly investigated and disclosed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> analysis </s>
<s> bbc sports editor dan roan </s>
<s> this could serve as a wakeup call for british sport </s>
<s> the survey paints a mixed picture of the olympic and paralympic landscape </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> on the one hand nine out of 10 respondents answered positively about the quality of support they receive and the pride they feel representing their country </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but after a spate of bullying scandals in a variety of publicly funded sports over the past year it is also alarming to learn that so many athletes have experienced unacceptable behaviour and clearly fear being deselected if they speak out about it </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> uk sport says the fact they were prepared to conduct such a study proves they are addressing the problem and the additional funding for the british athletes commission will be welcomed by many </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but some critics would have liked to see the establishment of an independent sport ombudsman to rule on disputes and greater rights for athletes in the contracts they have to sign in return for funding </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> meanwhile debate will continue over whether british sport is any different from other walks of life when it comes to duty of care or if the nocompromise approach to the pursuit of medals is to blame for failings </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> sports writer sam smith who covered michael jordans golden years at the chicago bulls explains why coaches might pick someone for their height alone </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the simplistic notion is that the taller you are the closer you are to the basket and the easier it is to score he said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this has led to the cliché you cant teach height </s>
<s> you can get better in shooting you can get better in dribbling but you cant get better in size </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so could a young mr comey have been spotted for his height alone and then coached into becoming a basketball great </s>
<s> well talentspotting primarily based on peoples height has produced some amazing results </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> players such as tim duncan hakeem olajuwon and dirk nowitzki didnt start playing basketball until their late teens </s>
<s> they were talentspotted because they were tall and then went on to become greats of the game </s>

<s> for every tall man who makes the breakthrough there are probably hundreds of others brought into teams who ultimately amount to nothing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what about the social aspect dont most basketball players come from tough backgrounds turning to basketball as a route out of poverty </s>

<s> one advantage is actually in giving height </s>
<s> its been shown that kids from better backgrounds reach greater adult heights and this is due to better nutrition and better healthcare in childhood says mr stephensdavidowitz </s>

<s> yes you read that headline correctly </s>
<s> cheerleading should be included at the olympic games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> before you scoff and compare what you think cheerleading is to the ageold olympic disciplines of athletics swimming and rowing we urge you to continue reading </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> women shouting givemeana and waving pompoms this aint </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> competitive or allstar cheerleading is one of the most highrisk adrenalineinducing sports around </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the international cheerleading union icu world championship finals took place at walt disney world in orlando on friday and englands coed men and women elite squad are the new world champions </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> coed squads feature both men and women </s>
<s> scotland ireland and wales all sent teams too </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what is allstar cheerleading </s>
<s> this is a million miles from the sideline cheerleading youd typically see during halftime at american football or basketball matches </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> teams of up to 35 athletes  both coed and allgirl divisions feature are judged on stunts pyramids tumbles jumps and dance during an exhilarating and lungbusting twoandahalfminute routine </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the judging system is similar to that of diving synchronised swimming and gymnastics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> here is our threepoint argument for why cheerleading should be seriously considered for the olympic roster come los angeles 2028 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> 1 </s>
<s> its that sport you never knew you loved </s>
<s> we all become obsessed with watching new obscure sports during the olympics </s>
<s> curling fencing dancing horses </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> theres always at least one </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> not only is cheerleading exciting noisy and slightly terrifying to watch live in the arena it is also utterly captivating to watch on the small screen </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> team england had the chance to showoff their skills at disneys allstar sports field  an iconic venue in the world of cheerleading </s>
<s> slowmotion replays of gravitydefying stunts yes please </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> watching some of the most highlyskilled young athletes working together like a welloiled machine to produce a meticulously executed routine absolutely </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the highrisk factor makes it all the more enthralling for the viewer too </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is not uncommon for a flyer the athlete literally thrown into the air to fall during a stunt </s>
<s> but dont worry  one of the first things you are taught is how to fall and catch in the safest way possible </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> 2 </s>
<s> it will not be a onehorse race </s>
<s> as the current incarnation of cheerleading originated in north america it seems fitting that the first olympic medals would be contested in its homeland </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but there are many countries who will happily and convincingly challenge the prospective favourites team usa for the inaugural title </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> team usa have dominated but the gap is narrowing every year  the eagles were beaten in the allgirl premier division by finland this year </s>
<s> at this weeks world championships teams from mexico norway new zealand and chile all claimed podium finishes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> team england have historically been fierce competitors too </s>
<s> they have earned medals at the last three world championships  no mean feat </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and other powerhouse cheer nations such as japan canada and china have delivered stunningly creative and complex routines at the top level </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it may also surprise you that team finland have the potential to shock  they caused a huge upset in the hotlycontested allgirl premier division this year by beating team usa to the gold </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it has all the ingredients for a very exciting competition </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> 3 </s>
<s> it will finally give cheerleading the kudos it deserves </s>
<s> cheerleaders everywhere have been arguing with sceptics for years about its credibility  mainly about its status as a sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but if you were to look up the dictionary definition of sport it ticks every box </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> an activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others for entertainment </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> gold medallists also receive a coveted world champion ring </s>
<s> these athletes train just as hard as gymnasts for just as many hours as a synchronised swim team and compete as often as volleyball teams </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in 2019 three years after being granted provisional olympic status by the ioc cheerleading will be able to apply to become part of the full olympic games sports programme </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so la 2028 is not beyond the realms of possibility </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> cheerleading is a sport with growing popularity </s>
<s> it has a strong youth focus and we noted that ioc sports director kit mcconnell said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the icu has more than 100 national federations and almost 4 </s>
<s> 5 million registered athletes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> at the highest level cheerleading is a visual treat hugely competitive and its athletes are passionate  nay  obsessed with their sport </s>

<s> former korean basketball league player david simon had to head back to the us </s>
<s> after south koreas basketball league kicked out a foreign player for being too tall news reports have since emerged of athletes desperately trying to shrink themselves </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a new height limit imposed on the sport has drawn both controversy and ridicule for its attempt to cut foreigners down to size </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what exactly happened </s>
<s> the korean basketball league kbl recently angered fans when it announced a significant change in the rules </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> each team in south korea can have only two foreign players </s>
<s> starting with the 201819 season one of these players must not be taller than 200cm 6ft 6in while the other one cannot be taller than 186cm </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this meant that one of the countrys most popular foreign players  an american called david simon  had to leave </s>
<s> at 202 </s>
<s> 1cm he had missed the cutoff by just millimetres </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i was a little upset mr simon recently told the bbc world services os programme </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> just to be that close and not be able to make it kind of stinks </s>
<s> doesnt look like ill be going back there to play unless they change the rule again </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> simon who had topped the kbl in the previous basketball season had to head home to the us much to fans chagrin </s>
<s> a petition was filed to the south korean presidential office to abolish the kbls height rules and bring back simon reported yonhap news </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> fans then took to social media to bid farewell to departing players </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> skip instagram post by coconkat </s>
<s> report </s>
<s> end of instagram post by coconkat </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> why has south korea done this </s>
<s> its not the first time this has happened </s>
<s> in fact korea has had a height limit for foreign players since 1997 but this is the shortest that has ever imposed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the kbl has maintained that it has to protect local players who on average cannot match the heights of foreign players mostly americans </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> image copyrightgetty imagesimage captionathletes like charles rhodes have made the cut in south korea but not others </s>
<s> the league has also said the height limit will lead to better games with higher scores and a faster pace </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we believe this new height restriction will revive the popularity of pro basketball in the country kbl secretary general lee sunghan told yonhap </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> is south korea alone in this </s>
<s> the lack of extremely tall local players appears to be particularly acute in asia where for every yao ming 229cm there are many more players of average height </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its one reason why the basketball league in the philippines has had for decades a 200cm height limit for foreign players as permitting american 7footers to play would wreak havoc reported slate magazine </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the debate has long overshadowed the sport </s>
<s> way back in 1957 sports illustrated magazine ran a discussion with both proponents and opponents arguing that either way a height limit was discriminatory </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> image copyrightafpimage captionchinese player yao ming is 229cm and a star in the us </s>
<s> there are advantages and disadvantages both to being taller and shorter donyell marshall the mens head coach of basketball at central connecticut state universitys blue devil athletics told the bbc </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> if youre taller you can score around the rim better you can block shots and you can rebound </s>
<s> but smaller players can usually shoot better </s>
<s> they are faster and better dribblers </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so how do you shrink a basketball player </s>
<s> its a shadowy science </s>
<s> yonhap reported that the south korean teams tried lifting weights and jogging before measurement hoping that dehydration could knock off a few centimetres </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in the 1970s and 1980s when bouffant hairstyles were popular philippine teams would shave their foreign players heads to battle height restrictions reported slate </s>
<s> other methods employed over the years include doing shoulder presses and squats with the idea that this could compress their bones </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> if all else failed some resorted to cheating  slouching bending their knees ever so slightly or leaning against the wall during measurement </s>
<s> but officials soon cottoned on  and simply measured the athletes while they lay flat on the ground </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> image copyrightgetty imagesimage captionthe kbl has claimed the height limit will lead to better games with higher scores and a faster pace </s>
<s> doctors say its almost impossible to shrink your body </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> first of all there hasnt been much of a market for shrinkage so theres hardly been any medical innovations </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its actually very rare </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> usually people want to grow taller and the technology has been there for that says dr tan chyn hong an orthopaedic surgeon and a former singapore national athlete </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> if you want to lose a lot there is no reasonable way to do that  short of chopping your bones </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but not all hope is lost </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nonsurgically there are things you can do to a very small degree says dr tan </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the discs in your spine are composed of water amongst other things so for example if you dehydrate yourself you could perhaps lose a bit of height from the shrinking of the accumulated discs </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i would say from doing that and maybe also slouching a bit its possible to lose 1cm  but any more than that is very tough </s>

<s> fulltime professional runner parttime cancer fighter </s>

<s> i have spent the past six and half years mostly focused on the running fortunately and not so much on the cancer </s>
<s> but things have changed for me since last august </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i dont know how many of you were following along since this little event known as the olympics was going on but after failing to make us olympic team for rio i spent the rest of my summer dealing with a cancer recurrence  and plotting a way back into competitive middistance running </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in 2016 the rare cancer adenoid cystic carcinoma acc i was diagnosed with in my salivary gland in 2009 had returned this time in my liver </s>
<s> my husband justin an internal medicine resident physician gave me a hug on a sunday morning in early august and noticed that something felt weird about my abdomen </s>
<s> i agreed </s>
<s> i had felt some tingling and fullness in that area over the last month or so but nothing painful or too out of the ordinary </s>
<s> long story short a trip to the er later that same day showed what we had both feared there was a large tumour in my liver </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the next few days and weeks were filled with oncology appointments a biopsy confirming the lesion was metastatic acc and a plan for surgery </s>
<s> i felt extremely lucky that the tumour was in my liver as i learned what an amazing and resilient organ it is </s>
<s> my surgical oncologist explained that after i underwent a right hepatectomy the left half of my liver would grow into the space previously occupied by the right and essentially function as a normal liver after about two weeks </s>
<s> they expected to remove all the tumour during surgery and i prayed that would be the case </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i woke up disoriented from the anesthesia on the afternoon of august 26th to the good news that even though he had a tougher time than expected removing the tumour in one piece my surgeon felt confident that they got it all out </s>
<s> what a huge relief i left the hospital six days later on september 1st with a gnarly 13inch incision in its early phase of healing feeling pretty rough but overall pleased with my recovery </s>
<s> i had lost about ten pounds and walked hunched over a bit from the forward lean i used to protect the initial pain of stretching the scar but i was doing well </s>
<s> well enough to attend my brothers wedding that weekend and shimmy around awkwardly on the dance floor </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> going for long walks and riding my bike alongside justin on his runs were my exercise of choice for the first few weeks after surgery </s>
<s> i enjoyed the perfect fall weather in minneapolis and even though i was a little sad i wasnt able to run in it i was just happy to be alive and presumably cancerfree </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> fast forward to november and i was getting antsy about training for the upcoming track season </s>
<s> the abdominal muscles that were sliced through in august were still healing but getting closer to feeling normal </s>
<s> some manual therapy and exercises had helped expedite the process but i knew my body would heal in its own time  whether that took a few months or over a year remained to be seen </s>
<s> since the surgery i had tried to start up running a handful of times up to about four miles at a time before having to stop due to incisionrelated pain </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> i had to walk home from more than a couple of runs and did my best to listen to my body when something didnt feel right </s>

<s> championship tip </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the people may change the venue may change but the ring shot and track stay the same </s>

<s> i would put pressure on myself because it was a championship </s>
<s> but the facts are facts </s>
<s> the shot is the same and the ring is the same </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> as a result any records set before 2005 are now at risk  almost half of the 146 mens and womens indoor and outdoor records </s>
<s> these include marks that have never been subject to suspicion prompting an outcry from many of the existing record holders </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> seven of the eight mens field events world records and the womens 100m 200m 400m and 800m marks could go </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> all athletics world records set before 2005 could be rewritten under a revolutionary new proposal from european athletics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the credibility of records was examined following the sports doping scandal </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> britains paula radcliffe who faces losing her 2003 marathon world record called the proposals cowardly </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i am hurt and do feel this damages my reputation and dignity she said adding that the governing bodies had again failed clean athletes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> svein arne hansen the european athletics president said world records are meaningless if people dont really believe them </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however radcliffe said the changes were heavy handed and confusing to the public </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> european athletics set up a taskforce to look into the credibility of world records in january </s>
<s> its ruling council has now ratified the proposals put forward by the taskforce and it wants the sports world governing body the iaaf to adopt the changes it sets out </s>
<s> how will world records be recognised </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> if the proposals are accepted by the iaaf a world record would only be recognised if it meets all three of the following criteria </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it was achieved at a competition on a list of approved international events where the highest standards of officiating and technical equipment can be guaranteed </s>
<s> the athlete had been subject to an agreed number of doping control tests in the months leading up to it </s>
<s> the doping control sample taken after the record was stored and available for retesting for 10 years </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the iaaf has stored blood and urine samples only since 2005 and current records that do not meet the new criteria would remain on an alltime list but not be officially recognised as records </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this would include jonathan edwards triple jump record of 18 </s>
<s> 29m  set in 1995  and colin jacksons 1994 indoor 60m hurdles world record of 7 </s>
<s> 30secs as well as radcliffes marathon mark of two hours 15 minutes and 25 seconds set in 2003 using two male pacemakers </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mary keitany of kenya broke radcliffes womensonly world record to win the 2017 london marathon in two hours 17 minutes one second the secondfastest time in history </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the council also recommended that a performance should be wiped from record books if the athlete had committed a doping or integrity violation even if it does not directly impact the record performance </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> why are the changes needed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the proposals are a response to last years mclaren report which uncovered widespread doping in sport  and athletics in particular </s>
<s> russian athletes are currently banned from international competition unless they can satisfy strict criteria to show they are clean </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> more than 100 olympic athletes who competed at the 2008 and 2012 games have been sanctioned for doping after the international olympic committee embarked on a programme of retesting old samples </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there are records in which people in the sport the media and the public do not have complete confidence added taskforce chair pierce ocallaghan </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what has the reaction been so far iaaf president lord coe said the changes were a step in the right direction </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there will be athletes current record holders who will feel that the history we are recalibrating will take something away from them but if organised and structured properly we have a good chance of winning back credibility in this area he said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> european athletics president hansen said he would encourage the iaaf to adopt the proposal at its august council meeting </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what we are proposing is revolutionary and not just because most world and european records will have to be replaced hansen added </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we want to raise the standards for recognition to a point where everyone can be confident that everything is fair and above board </s>
<s>  radcliffes statement in full </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> radcliffe has previously criticised plans to wipe records from the books and last month told bbc sport she favoured making doping a criminal offence instead to deter cheats </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she issued a statement on monday criticising the new proposals and athletics governing bodies </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i worked extremely hard for my pbs and they will always be valid to me </s>
<s> i know they were set through hard work and best effort and abiding by all the rules and am proud of them radcliffe wrote </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> governing bodies have a duty to protect every clean athlete here they again fail those athletes </s>
<s> we had to compete against cheats they couldnt provide us a level playing field we lost out on medals moments and earnings due to cheats saw our sport dragged through the mud due to cheats and now thanks to those who cheat we potentially lose our world and area records </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> although we are moving forward i dont believe we are yet at the point where we have a testing procedure capable of catching every cheat out there so why reset at this point do we really believe a record set in 2015 is totally clean and one in 1995 not </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i am hurt and do feel this damages my reputation and dignity </s>
<s> it is a heavy handed way to wipe out some really suspicious records in a cowardly way by simply sweeping all aside instead of having the guts to take the legal plunge and wipe any record that would be found in a court of law to have been illegally assisted </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is confusing to the public at a time when athletics already struggles to market itself </s>
<s> how do they explain how stadium club and national records are better than the area or world marks or will they force all those to be to wiped out too </s>
<s> when sir roger bannister ran one mile in under four minutes on 6 may 1954 it was hailed as a groundbreaking moment for sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> his time of three minutes 59 </s>
<s> 4 seconds broke both psychological and physiological barriers </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> now 63 years later an attempt will be made to shatter another of sports landmark times  a sub twohour marathon </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bannisters mile was a triumph of corinthian values and spirit </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however this marathon  to be run in under 120 minutes  is organised by sportswear giant nike and the event taking place in northern italy on saturday morning has a distinctly corporate feel about it </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is the ultimate endurance test but also one which no fans or broadcast journalists will be able to see </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so is it an expensive pr and marketing exercise </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> or given its aim to knock close to three minutes off the best time anyone has ever ran 26 </s>
<s> 2 miles should it be viewed as a laudable attempt to use sporting excellence and science to push human endurance to dizzying new heights </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a place in history but not the record books </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the world record for the marathon was set by kenyas dennis kimetto in berlin in 2014 </s>
<s> his time of two hours two minutes 57 seconds is the closest anyone has ever come to going under two hours </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however it will be not be kimetto stepping up to this challenge </s>
<s> the job lies instead with his compatriot eliud kipchoge zersenay tadese of eritrea and lelisa desisa of ethiopia </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> kipchoge as the reigning olympic marathon champion perhaps has the greatest chance </s>
<s> his personal best of 203 </s>
<s> 05 set in london in 2016 is impressive and just eight seconds shy of the record </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> to break the twohour marathon barrier a runner would need to beat the fastestever marathon by about 3 </s>
<s> that means they would need to shave seven seconds off each of the races 26 </s>
<s> 2 miles </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> therefore to go under two hours will require a substantial improvement  something that several sports scientists believe is simply beyond what is currently humanly possible </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nike dont really do perceived wisdom though </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> they have signed up the three elite performers paying them to forego the london and berlin marathons this season so they can focus their full attention on what the company has branded breaking2 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> historical weather patterns have been studied and a threeday window chosen in the belief it will offer optimum conditions </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it has since been narrowed further and so at 0545 local time on saturday morning the three men will set off in pursuit of a place in history but not the record books </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this is because of the use of inout pacemakers 20 of which will be deployed to keep the pace at a necessary level </s>
<s> their use is against athletics regulations so no matter what time is set on saturday morning it wont be considered a valid world record </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the pacers will also work in formations to defend the three runners from head or crosswinds </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> how are they trying to do this </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> inout pacemaking is just one facet of what is a complex and expensive operation </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> according to runners world magazine several locations were scouted worldwide in search of the perfect venue </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> courses in the netherlands chicago and berlin are all said to have been considered and eventually rejected </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> monza just north of milan is more used to hosting formula 1 races but was finally chosen because of its gentle corners climatic conditions and the fact its both flat and 600ft above sea level </s>
<s> so 17 </s>
<s> 5 laps of a 2400m course await </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nikes legion of scientists performance coaches nutritionists and medical staff are also leaving nothing to chance </s>
<s> mobile ultrasound units have been used to measure glycogen levels in the runners legs core temperature pills an ingestible thermometer that transmits data are taken by the runners and the latest advances in recovery methods are in use to provide every possible chance of success </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> staff on scooters will deliver energy drinks to the three runners to ensure they dont waste vital seconds slowing down or even slightly veering off course to grab them from roadside tables </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and then theres the runners kit  or more specifically the shoes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nike says its own tests on a special new shoe  passed as legal by the international association of athletics federations iaaf technical committee  make runners up to 4 more efficient </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> transform a sport  the marketing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so is the attempt just about selling very expensive shoes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nikes big corporate rival adidas is planning its own sub twohour marathon attempt but wants to do so in a race setting perhaps laying claim by so doing to a greater sense of authenticity </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but nikes vice president of special projects sandy bodecker is perhaps unsurprisingly enthusiastic about the impact that going under two hours will have even if it is under such controlled conditions </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the sub twohour marathon barrier is one of those rare ones that if broken can transform a sport he says </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its the last big onceinageneration barrier it will impact the way runners view distance running and human potential forever </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its a big claim but very much in line with a company ethos that urges elite athletes and park plodders alike to just do it </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> others however are critical of the attempt given the moneynoobject resources that have been thrown at it and the fact it will not count as a legitimate record </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> is media presence a distraction </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the attempt is also notable in that the worlds media are being blocked from witnessing it </s>
<s> this is very much a behindcloseddoors event which is unusual given the corporate fanfare it is accompanied by </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there will be no fans lining the steep grandstands that are usually filled by thousands of formula 1 tifosi on race days </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it suggests that with everything else under tight control spectators and journalists would be a distraction from the task at hand </s>
<s> the very early start time no doubt presents logistical issues too </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> instead nike have allowed a few handpicked journalists to attend who have also covered the buildup to the big day </s>
<s> a web stream will also provide coverage of the runners on the asphalt track </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> some supporters of the project have called it a moonshot given the scale of ambition and the effort expended to get to this point </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so just like neil armstrongs famous first step on the lunar surface in 1969 the world will be required to watch and wonder </s>

<s> analysis  the man not the shoes </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> bbc athletics commentator ed harry </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> amid the furore over proposals to not call anything pre2005 a world record theres some irony that we can get so excited about a race where a world record cant be set </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> saturday 6 may is the preferred date which is also the 63rd anniversary of roger bannister breaking the fourminute barrier for the mile </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there are definite parallels </s>
<s> there was plenty of controversy about bannisters attempt just as there is about whats happening in monza </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but an athlete racing against the clock goes to the heart of what the sport has always been </s>
<s> if anyone can do this its eliud kipchoge </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but that still means him running more than three minutes faster than his current best </s>
<s> the man not the shoes nor the science will have to find most of that </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> if you want to start running but feel nervous about doing it on your own runtogether could be the answer </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a new national programme set up by england athletics runtogether aims to motivate people to improve their physical and mental health by running with others </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> by simply logging on to the website youll have access to local running groups which offer fun organised jogs and runs with other people with qualified group leaders </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the website also includes access to marked running routes specific to your area searchable using your postcode </s>
<s> trying to start running can be a daunting task as sam mollaghan  the face of the this girl can run campaign and a qualified run leader  understands </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when i started running a couple of years ago i was very selfconscious about how others would perceive me she said </s>
<s> so i empathise with how many runners feel anxious when running alone </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> now im a run leader im able to help others enjoy the benefits that regular running in a group has to offer  its such a great way to improve fitness and socialise at the same time </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> im also more confident when i run as i know im doing something that benefits my health and mindset </s>
<s> ive made some great friends in running groups and would encourage as many people to join their local group </s>
<s>  runners are also being encouraged to take photos and tag which friends and celebrities they would like to run with using runtogether </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> matt birkett head of running participation at england athletics said we know that running with others is more effective in changing behaviour making people more likely to sustain a running habit and we know how much of an impact running has on improving emotional health and wellbeing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we want to get one million more people into regular athletics and running by 2021 and ensure that everyone in england has access to a local runtogether group across the country </s>
