<s> european athletics set up a taskforce to look into the credibility of world records in january </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its ruling council has ratified the proposals put forward by the taskforce and it wants world governing body the international association of athletics federations iaaf to back them when its council meets in august </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> taskforce chair pierce ocallaghan told bbc sport on tuesday the plans were about restoring credibility </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> obviously this has to stand up to a court of law he added </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> because in the past there have been threats of legal action when this has been mooted </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> asked whether more legal challenges were expected he said no weve just changed the rules of the sport </s>
<s> these are sports rules </s>
<s> it would be like somebody challenging the referee in a football game </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> these proposals will come back to the council and i look forward to maybe counter proposals and maybe changes maybe thoughts around it </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> we have to start somewhere </s>
<s> this is a debate the athletes have prompted the administrators to have for far too long </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> paula radcliffe who faces losing her 2003 marathon world record has called the proposals cowardly </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however fellow british runner darren campbell says the move would be for the greater good </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> powell set the long jump world record at the 1991 world championships in tokyo beating bob beamons mark of 8 </s>
<s> 90m which had led the field for 23 years </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> twentysix years on only the discus throw 1986 the hammer throw 1986 and shot put 1990 world records have stood for longer in mens outdoor athletics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> retirement is supposed to signal a fullstop </s>
<s> the end of one life the start of another </s>
<s> a sense of satisfaction a sense of closure </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there should be no limbo </s>
<s> but for goldie sayers  the 11time british javelin champion and threetime olympian who announced the conclusion of her athletics career on wednesday  the wondering and what ifs will follow her into the future </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> after eight years of waiting sayers was told in september that she was being retrospectively awarded olympic bronze from the 2008 beijing games </s>
<s> mariya abakumova the russian who had finished second and who sayers had always suspected of cheating had failed a doping retest for a banned steroid </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> sayers now 34 celebrated with a coffee in waitrose with her mother liz </s>
<s> and then the limbo began abakumova appealing against her disqualification the legal process slowing to a crawl no medal in the post and no idea of when any of it will end </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> initially i was just really happy explained suffolkborn sayers </s>
<s> id been chasing something that had eluded me and then all of a sudden driving down the m11 i had it </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but actually now im much angrier about it  and im not an angry person at all </s>
<s> theres a deep sense of injustice </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i was desperate to draw a line under my career and move on because i think endings are important  but at this rate ill be drawing my pension before i get an olympic medal </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> sayers is not alone </s>
<s> the international olympic committee ioc has now caught 111 athletes with retrospective tests from the 2008 and 2012 olympics a welcome epidemic of late justice that has brought with it its own chaotic tail </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> because so many of those who fail retests routinely appeal to the court for arbitration for sport cas regardless of evidence or ethics those clean athletes promoted in their wake are left somewhere between regret exasperation and hope swindled out of their defining sporting moment denied the financial rewards that a medal would have brought left hanging by a system that is stumbling towards a cleaner future while trying to mop up the mess of the past </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its all about the moment for me says sayers now 34 </s>
<s> none of the other stuff that would have come with it  sponsorship profile the actual medal itself  matters in the same way </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> id love to be able to transport myself back to standing on an olympic podium but i wont ever be able to do that </s>
<s> you have had the greatest moment of your life stolen from you </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> javelin is literally one moment </s>
<s> the whole of my runup took 4 </s>
<s> 45 seconds the throw itself took 18 hundredths of a second 80 of my speed of release came from the last hundredth of a second </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when your timing is right and youre mentally and physically at one with your javelin time effectively stands still </s>
<s> those moments become exaggerated </s>
<s> the whole world makes sense in that instant </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> if youve seen the film limitless  where bradley cooper takes a pill and the whole world slows down and he can problem solve and make things happen  thats what javelin feels like when your timing is on </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> thats what you miss the flow through your body everything separating and moving as one </s>
<s> i miss time standing still </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and its about sharing that moment with other people </s>
<s> i remember celebrating what i knew was a personal best and british record over the road from the birds nest stadium </s>
<s> my mum a family friend whod come over to support my coach mark steve backley and his mentor john trower seb coe </s>
<s> there were a lot of people in that hotel bar </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> what is european athletics proposing </s>

<s> paralympian john stubbs is britains most successful archer with a cabinet full of accolades including a paralympic gold medal from 2008 and four world titles </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however the 51yearold has had to overcome a traumatic accident and battle mental health issues </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> john stubbs </s>
<s> stubbs began participating in archery as a hobby after a lifechanging accident in 1989 until he turned it into a career five years later </s>
<s> a lifesaving hoax call </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> aged 24 stubbs was content with his situation in life as he travelled home on his motorbike from his dream job as a fabrication engineer to his young wife and newborn son in warrington cheshire </s>
<s> but on a cold and dark evening his world was turned upside down </s>

<s> his ordeal was not over though </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> john stubbs </s>

<s> why get into sport	being active is a great way to improve your health clear your mind and put you into a better mood </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> who is it for	everyone there are sports clubs around the uk that cater for people with all kinds of impairments or health conditions </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> is there a cheap option	many clubs and sports centres offer free taster sessions so you can try different sports to find out which is your favourite </s>
<s> what if i want a proper workout	there are over 400 inclusive inclusive fitness initiative gyms around the country with specially designed equipment so youll be working up a sweat in no time </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> can i take it to another level	if youre a budding elite athlete maybe a paralympian there are plenty of opportunities to get spotted </s>
<s> join a sports club with professional coaches to reach your full potential </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> is there a family option	from obstacle races to treasure hunts the change 4 life website includes ideas for lots of fun sports and activities for the kids </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so where can i take part	take a look at our activity finder for events near you </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> whatever level you wish to take part sport and physical activity can be an enjoyable lifestyle choice </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> physical activity has a number of health benefits including helping to maintain a healthy weight lowering high blood pressure and boosting the immune system as well as boosting selfconfidence and preventing depression </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in the past it may have been difficult to find a local sports club which could cater for individual needs but nowadays nearly all sports have options or variations for disabled people and many clubs can cater for people regardless of physical limitations </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the english federation of disability sport can signpost you to numerous participation opportunities and programmes including information on opportunities to try out different sports in your local area </s>
<s> for other areas of the uk visit disability sport wales disability sports ni or scottish disability sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> check out our activity guide pages which cover over 70 sports each with a dedicated disability section </s>

<s> the richest boxer ever </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> wladimir klitschko and anthony joshua </s>
<s> joshua connected with a huge uppercut in round 11 to end klitschkos resistance </s>
<s> joshuas rise after being allbut beaten in the sixth round to administer a devastating uppercut and finish in the 11th wowed the world of boxing </s>
<s> american viewers tuned in and lapped up the destruction </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> legendary boxers sugar ray leonard and evander holyfield were just some of those tweeting praise while promoter eddie hearn believes his fighters profile is now stratospheric adding he is unquestionably world boxings biggest star </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> hearn is just a piece in the jigsaw of a team which has made joshua a juggernaut in world sport </s>
<s> his standing as a marketable asset for more than a dozen global brands brings closer his ambition to become boxings first billionaire while it also heaps pressure on his broad shoulders </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> not perfect joshua plans next steps </s>
<s> a yougov survey showed 20 of the uk population have a favourable view of him </s>
<s> that is a very good number for boxing which is not a mainstream sport </s>

<s> hes already working with brands from asia to the us the uk and dubai </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> i think he will certainly be the richest boxer ever and probably surpass floyd mayweather who set the benchmark </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> what we learned  a raw fighting machine </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> klitschko is no stranger to being knocked down  he hit the deck three times in beating samuel peter on points in 2005 and such resistance subsequently spawned an 11year unbeaten run until 2015 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the fact joshua has now tasted being decked and briefly humbled may well be viewed as a positive behind closed doors </s>
<s> no longer will doubters wonder about his heart </s>
<s> the world now knows what will is hidden beneath those pectorals </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> wladimir klitschko and anthony joshua </s>
<s> joshua was knocked down for the first time in his career in the sixth round </s>
<s> there comes a time where it comes from within said bbc radio 5 live pundit richie woodhall </s>
<s> it is dna or whatever you want to call it </s>
<s> those punches came from the depths of his soul </s>
<s> that is what being a world champion is all about </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this great british hope showed transitions boxing admirably early on taking punishment in the middle rounds and then switching things up to power punching seizing his moment with killer instinct </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there were times where he showed his inexperience but he learned and showed he isnt just a prospect said joshuas trainer rob mccracken </s>
<s> he can turn around fights and that will help him so much in his career </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> just 19 fights and now 55 rounds into his career joshua has every right to remain green in parts </s>
<s> smiles at his opponent and celebrations after knockdowns will perhaps be stamped out </s>
<s> indeed klitschko said afterwards he felt his rival lost focus at times </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in truth the grand surroundings of wembley are fit for a fully developed fighter </s>
<s> joshua beat one though both he and his team will admit he is not himself one yet even if he did answer questions </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> he was raw at times which he is and at times he was probably exposed but to get exposed in front of 90000 people to bite down on your gum shield and to knock out klitschko in the 11th round you cant buy that heart added hearn </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a show of temperament </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the chin has been tested as has joshuas heart but what about the mind </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> celebrities fell over themselves to engage with him within minutes of his win alist names on twitter jumping on the expanding aj bandwagon </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> joshua v klitschko </s>
<s> joshua has won all 19 of his professional victories inside the distance </s>
<s> he handled an expectant 90000 crowd and surely no fight to come can be bigger from a stadium perspective </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> yet heavyweight boxing can provide a slap of reality </s>
<s> mike tyson ran into buster douglas lennox lewis fell to hasim rahman </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but the focus and creative nature of his training drills  visible in their droves on instagram  seem to showcase a desire to keep striving and try different things in pursuit of excellence </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> the quest for perfection </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> presented by </s>
<s> david haye </s>
<s> former world champion </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> expert analysis from </s>
<s> rob mccracken </s>
<s> boxing coach </s>
<s> the night air crackled with tension </s>
<s> in the ring the two protagonists were engaged in boxings equivalent of a chess match  cagey tactical back and forth </s>
<s> then everything changed </s>
<s> the champion detonated a huge right hand perfectly timed onto the chin of the challenger and the fight was over </s>
<s> carl froch had defeated george groves in their rematch in may 2014 and the 80000 wembley crowd exploded at the raw brutal closure of the contest </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there are few sights in sport as shocking and unforgettable as witnessing a onepunch knockout </s>
<s> boxers have a wide variety of favourite types of punches and there are many different kinds of knockouts </s>
<s> but what components combine to produce perfection is power as important as technique and does timing beat speed </s>
<s> former wba heavyweight champion david haye is ideally qualified to answer these questions as he explains i have plenty of personal experience of knockouts as 26 of my 28 career victories to date have come by way of ko </s>
<s> so what does it take to land the perfect punch speed kills </s>
<s> jump media playermedia player helpout of media player </s>
<s> press enter to return or tab to continue </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> from carl froch to ricky hatton relive some memorable knockouts as the hayemaker gives priceless tips on improving your punching power david haye footage courtesy of dave all other fight footage courtesy of sky sports </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> david haye explains what makes the perfect punch </s>
<s> a misconception exists that a huge muscular guy can punch harder than a skinny guy </s>
<s> in my experience people who can move from one point to another quickly cannot only punch hard but knock out their opponents </s>
<s> throughout my career i have focused on being able to punch very fast and hit people where they cant see the punch </s>
<s> if you hit someone where theyre not aware there is going to be a punch landing they cant brace for it so the impact is much greater </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is hard to counter someone without speed unless you are very lucky and just wing a punch that your opponent doesnt see </s>
<s> timing is vital </s>
<s> speed and timing are both key but if your timing is out you cant land your punch </s>
<s> good balance is a crucial element of throwing a knockout punch </s>
<s> you need to be able to explode from your feet using every ounce of your weight </s>
<s> it is not about how strong your arms are  the key is to have a strong core in terms of your glutes hamstrings and quads </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> you need to generate power to explode through your target </s>
<s> it is not about how hard you can hit that person it is the velocity of the movement coming through the target that causes maximum impact </s>
<s> people who have high knockout ratios do not look to punch at their opponents chin they look to punch 12 inches through the chin and that motion is what leads to the knockout </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s> what it feels like to be knocked out </s>
<s> mike tyson knocks out british boxer julius francis </s>
<s> mike tyson knocks out julius francis </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> former british and commonwealth heavyweight champion julius francis describes what it was like facing mike tyson when they fought in manchester on 29 january 2000 </s>
<s> coming across the ring towards me tyson had this unbelievable intensity and ferocity about him </s>
<s> my plan went straight out the window </s>
<s> if someone hits me i want to hit him back thats the sort of person i am </s>
<s> but its different against tyson </s>
<s> he hit me immediately with a big right and i was shocked by the speed and power of the punches that followed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i was knocked down in the first round </s>
<s> i got up he carried on and the rest of the fight was a bit of a blur </s>
<s> he was hitting me with all sorts of body and head shots he even lifted me off the ground with some of them and i weighed 17 stone it was relentless </s>
<s> the angles he got into me from were incredible </s>
<s> people always talk about his punching power but his technique and timing are also excellent </s>
<s> he always gets inside you and can outbox and outjab you </s>
<s> he was such a gifted fighter </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when i was interviewed afterwards they told me i had been knocked down five times and i was amazed </s>
<s> i didnt believe them until i watched it on a monitor </s>
<s> i wasnt really thinking about it at the time and just kept on getting back up </s>
<s> the pain didnt kick in properly until i was back in the hotel after the press conference then i was in all sorts of agony </s>
<s> i lay in the bath for hours recovering </s>
<s> i wont forget the pain in a hurry </s>

<s> 1997 was the year when in only his second year as a trainer under national hunt rules shropshires steve brookshaw prepared the new zealandbred horse so well that it galloped past the winning post at aintree by 25 lengths the largest winning margin since red rums third win 20 years earlier </s>

<s> saturdays trip to aintree </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> lord gyllenes team </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> owner trainer and horse  steve brookshaw stan clarke and lord gyllene the morning after their 1997 grand national victory </s>
<s> the horse bred in new zealand winning twice down under before coming to england after being brought by stan clarke in 1995 </s>
<s> was trained at steve brookshaws yard at preston farm uffington near shrewsbury winning five and being placed in five of his 13 races seven of them at uttoxeter before being retired in 2001 </s>
<s> he remained with his owners family until he died in december 2016  at 28 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the owner staffordshireborn stan clarke was a selfmade property developer millionaire who briefly trained horses before becoming a racecourse owner buying uttoxeter his local track then brighton fontwell park yarmouth bath hereford and sedgefield under the northern racing banner </s>
<s> bought dunstall hall now owned by nottingham forest owner fawaz al hasawi </s>
<s> died in september 2004 aged 71 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the trainer coming from a long line of horsemen in his family steve brookshaw began his racing career as a jockey who rode 148 pointtopoint winners as well as having 25 winners under national hunt rules </s>
<s> took out a training licence in 1996 enjoying an aintree winner in his first season prior to lord gyllenes success in 1997 </s>
<s> now 66 and works on a stud farm in north shropshire </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the jockey northern irishman tony dobbin rode over 1200 winners in his career of which winning the national in 1997 was the highlight </s>
<s> rode mostly for nicky richards son of shropshireowned one mans trainer gordon richards at his yard at greystoke near penrith cumbria where he met his future wife rose </s>
<s> retired from racing in 2008 </s>
<s> now 44 and helping to run his wifes yard in northumberland </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> tony dobbins 1997 grand national win was the biggest of his 1200plus winning rides as a jockey </s>
<s> so why did brookshaw get out of racing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> within a decade of lord gyllenes win brookshaw had packed in the racing game </s>
<s> but why </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we werent making enough money he says with great honesty </s>
<s> if you won the national every year you might do well </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> lord gyllene was still improving but he had a lot of leg trouble </s>
<s> twice we aimed him at aintree again but he we had to pull him out each time and we never quite got him back up to his peak </s>
<s> hed done quite a bit of racing back in his days in new zealand and so much racing takes its toll in the end eventually </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> to make money and survive you have to win big races and you need good horses and we just werent getting the material to work with </s>
<s> it was best to get out and go down another route </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> unfortunately a lot of people who own horses dont really know about horses dont know what can go wrong and how long for </s>
<s> you have a lot of explaining to do several times over </s>
<s> owners end up thinking can someone else do a better job but thats why you often see a horse go round several trainers </s>
<s> its usually because the horse itself wasnt good enough in the first place </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i dont really miss it </s>
<s> i was putting myself under too much pressure admits brookshaw who still rides out daily for his daughter </s>
<s> i like a nice quieter life </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> steve and zena brookshaws daughter heidi now trains on her own mostly for pointtopoint races </s>
<s> carrying on the brookshaw family tradition </s>

<s> by iain carter </s>
<s> bbc golf correspondent </s>
<s> from the sectiongolf  143 </s>
<s> share this page </s>
<s> dustin johnson </s>
<s> dustin johnson hit a drive of 428 yards at the tournament of champions in hawaii in january </s>
<s> one of the games most influential leaders has admitted the modern golf ball travels too far for the good of the sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mike davis is chief executive of the united states golf association usga which along with the st andrewsbased ra sets the rules of the game </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in recent decades courses all over the world have been forced to expand to accommodate the vast distances generated by modern players </s>
<s> they are helped by drivers with large sweetspots and balls that spin less and travel further </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> many courses have been rendered obsolete for the professional game because they are simply too short </s>
<s> others such as the old course at st andrews need to use tees outside the boundaries of the course to create the requisite distance to make holes sufficiently testing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> former greats including jack nicklaus gary player and greg norman insist the ball is travelling too far </s>
<s> indeed nicklaus an 18time major champion told bbc sport last year it is the most ridiculous thing in the game </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> yet the authorities have done nothing to shorten the distance a ball flies </s>
<s> they appear accepting of the status quo and the ra and usga published recent data they claim proves that length off the tee has plateaued </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this may be the case however few tournament weeks go by without stories of professionals dispatching drives more than 400 yards </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> current leading pga average driving distances </s>
<s> 1 dustin johnson us  316 </s>
<s> 2 yards </s>
<s> 2 luke list us  312 yards </s>
<s> 3 andrew loupe us  311 </s>
<s> 1 yards </s>
<s> tour average 289 </s>
<s> 7 yards </s>
<s> source pga tour </s>
<s> and davis has now admitted there is a problem with distance </s>
<s> in a wideranging interview with us online magazine golfworld he said my biggest regret would be what has happened with distance </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its been the thing probably more than any that has been the most harmful to the game </s>
<s> billions of dollars have been spent to alter golf courses  and for what </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> davis acknowledges manufacturers do not want to make equipment that is less powerful and players love to see their ball travel long distances </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nobody wants to hit the ball shorter he said </s>
<s> on the other hand increased distance has had a profoundly negative effect on golf courses </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> theyve had to expand theyve had to use more resources to maintain </s>
<s> it takes more time to play </s>
<s> it takes more land and construction costs for new golf courses </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and in some cases architectural integrity has been compromised </s>
<s> are any of these things good </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i sometimes wish we could just snap our fingers and say were going to roll the entire golf world back on distance </s>
<s>  but the stark reality is that would be chaotic and would likely not be supported by the masses </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and this is why we should not expect much change in the coming years despite the overwhelming logic that says a shorter game would make the sport cheaper and more attractive </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> rory mcilroy at this years masters </s>
<s> rory mcilroy was ninth on last years pga tour list with an average of 306 yards </s>
<s> indeed european tour chief executive keith pelley argues fans love to see the likes of rory mcilroy propel drives more than 350 yards </s>
<s> he believes it is a genuine spectacle </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> and when fans stand around tournament tees and witness such prodigious hitting their awe is audible </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> davis though believes it is incumbent upon the rulesmakers to at least discuss the issue </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> weve really not talked about it he said </s>
<s> but with the ra and the usgas responsibility to look out to the future theres a genuine interest to say maybe we wont get there but shame on us if we dont at least talk about it </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> during the lengthy interview davis raised a number of issues pertinent to the running of courses at the level of the humble amateur </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in the uk we are entering a period of the year when our greens start to be shaved to maximise speed and rough is grown as fairways are narrowed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> from personal experience these developments tend to be welcomed but postround many club golfers feel beaten by tricky penal course setups </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> davis who has been laying out us open courses since 2006 sympathises with those for whom the game is rendered too difficult </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> when i talk to architects for about 40 years hard equalled good he said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> now youre definitely seeing that go in the other direction where fun equals good </s>
<s> these practices of narrower fairways higher rough not encouraging play from the proper tees its no good </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> today people equate fast greens with good greens </s>
<s> but fast greens cost more to maintain </s>
<s> fast greens are more susceptible to disease </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> fast greens compromise some of the architectural integrity of great courses </s>
<s> fast greens have absolutely caused more cases of the yips </s>
<s> and theyve hurt pace of play </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> davis also contends that fairway grass tends to be cut too short leaving tighter lies that make ballstriking and chipping more difficult </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> growing up we didnt hear about people skulling chip shots the 52yearold said </s>
<s> now you hear about the chip yips </s>
<s> so weve been trying to message keep your fairways drier but longer </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> whether this message is heard by golf clubs of the world remains to be seen </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but on the key issue of distance davis has shown he does have ears and has listened to the argument that the ball travels too far </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> furthermore he clearly accepts the logic </s>
<s> the problem is it seems too late to do anything about it </s>

<s> this year marks the 50th anniversary of the bbc first broadcasting the masters from the augusta national in georgia and some familiar names have shared their memories of playing in watching and commentating on one of the worlds most iconic sporting events </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> peter alliss played in the first masters covered by the bbc in 1967 having also contested the previous years tournament and although he was initially unimpressed as a player he has grown fond of the place since becoming a commentator </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> arnies hug  peter alliss bbc tv commentator </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> playing there wasnt a happy experience for me </s>
<s> i realised that you werent really made to feel welcome back in the 1960s </s>
<s> that goes against everything they say today </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> you had to have a local caddie </s>
<s> the locals didnt want to caddie as they felt you had little chance of doing well and hence they had little chance of getting a good tip </s>
<s> it was very overpowering </s>
<s> from my point of view i was overawed by the whole thing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but i have marvelled at the place since </s>
<s> it is fearless when it comes to innovation </s>
<s> and when you go out in front of the clubhouse where they sit under the big trees you see the famous faces from days gone by </s>
<s> some are missing some new ones come some never change </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> two years ago i was walking and the late arnold palmer was there </s>
<s> we were great friends since the 1950s </s>
<s> he gave me a big hug in front of hundreds of people they had no idea who i was </s>
<s> its just people </s>
<s> the people for me make it </s>
<s> theres just a general feeling that its just different </s>

<s> masters 2017 why sergio garcias win was so special </s>
<s> serenity was a word that sprang to mind throughout the epic masters that spawned sergio garcias maiden major victory </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the 37yearold broke through thanks to an apparent inner peace that enabled him to cope with all that augusta and the elements could throw at him </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> whether it was the gusty winds of the first two days or the intimidating lastday surge of justin rose as he collected a hattrick of frontnine birdies garcia remained unperturbed in becoming the only man to be subpar in all four rounds </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is a state of mind that was beyond the spaniard in pretty much all of his previous 73 attempts to win a major </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i felt very calm garcia said during his champions news conference </s>
<s> i felt very at ease </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> is garcias win the perfect sporting story </s>
<s> amazing to join idols ballesteros and olazabal </s>
<s> watch the best shots from the 2017 masters </s>
<s> sitting there in his newly won green jacket it seemed garcia had finally found the secret  a key to unlock the major puzzle </s>
<s> and it could equip him well in his quest to ensure he does not become a onehit wonder at major level </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this was particularly apparent when he recounted the events of the parfive 13th in his final round on sunday </s>
<s> he had bogeyed the 10th and 11th and now his drive caught a tree and dropped into an unplayable position beneath a bush </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> commentating on bbc radio 5 live i suggested we were witnessing another major implosion from a player burdened by a suffocating desire to land the most glamorous of golfs top four prizes </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in the past i would have started going at my caddie garcia admitted </s>
<s> and oh you know why doesnt it go through the trees branches and whatever </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but i was like well if thats what is supposed to happen let it happen </s>
<s> lets try to make a great five here and see if we can put in a hell of a finish to have a chance </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> sergio garcia shakes hands with padraig harrington after the latter wins the open in a playoff at carnoustie in 2007 </s>
<s> garcia lost the 2007 open to padraig harrington in a playoff  the first of the irishmans three majors in two seasons </s>
<s> and if not well shake justins hand and congratulate him for winning </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> so i think i did that very well throughout the whole week and its something i need to keep improving and keep getting better at it </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a better mental attitude would work in tandem with impressive physical conditioning that shows no sign of deterioration </s>
<s> garcia had played 71 consecutive majors heading into the masters </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> that speaks volumes for his longevity and consistency at the top of the game despite several relative troughs before this standout peak in his career graph </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> now he is entitled to feel as though he can swiftly become a multiple major champion in the way padraig harrington did a decade ago </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it has since been narrowed further and so at 0545 local time on saturday morning the three men will set off in pursuit of a place in history but not the record books </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this is because of the use of inout pacemakers 20 of which will be deployed to keep the pace at a necessary level </s>
<s> their use is against athletics regulations so no matter what time is set on saturday morning it wont be considered a valid world record </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the pacers will also work in formations to defend the three runners from head or crosswinds </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nikes legion of scientists performance coaches nutritionists and medical staff are also leaving nothing to chance </s>
<s> mobile ultrasound units have been used to measure glycogen levels in the runners legs core temperature pills an ingestible thermometer that transmits data are taken by the runners and the latest advances in recovery methods are in use to provide every possible chance of success </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> staff on scooters will deliver energy drinks to the three runners to ensure they dont waste vital seconds slowing down or even slightly veering off course to grab them from roadside tables </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> nikes big corporate rival adidas is planning its own sub twohour marathon attempt but wants to do so in a race setting perhaps laying claim by so doing to a greater sense of authenticity </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but nikes vice president of special projects sandy bodecker is perhaps unsurprisingly enthusiastic about the impact that going under two hours will have even if it is under such controlled conditions </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the attempt is also notable in that the worlds media are being blocked from witnessing it </s>
<s> this is very much a behindcloseddoors event which is unusual given the corporate fanfare it is accompanied by </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there will be no fans lining the steep grandstands that are usually filled by thousands of formula 1 tifosi on race days </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it suggests that with everything else under tight control spectators and journalists would be a distraction from the task at hand </s>
<s> the very early start time no doubt presents logistical issues too </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> instead nike have allowed a few handpicked journalists to attend who have also covered the buildup to the big day </s>
<s> a web stream will also provide coverage of the runners on the asphalt track </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> some supporters of the project have called it a moonshot given the scale of ambition and the effort expended to get to this point </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so just like neil armstrongs famous first step on the lunar surface in 1969 the world will be required to watch and wonder </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> saturday 6 may is the preferred date which is also the 63rd anniversary of roger bannister breaking the fourminute barrier for the mile </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> there are definite parallels </s>
<s> there was plenty of controversy about bannisters attempt just as there is about whats happening in monza </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but an athlete racing against the clock goes to the heart of what the sport has always been </s>
<s> if anyone can do this its eliud kipchoge </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but that still means him running more than three minutes faster than his current best </s>
<s> the man not the shoes nor the science will have to find most of that </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> however jamaicabased duo zharnel hughes and miguel francis are among fierce competition for the two spots on offer at julys british team trials </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> making that team  youll know you are among the worlds best said gemili </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it is going to be really difficult </s>
<s> the depth is great and everyone is going to have to be in good shape for the trials because nothing is given </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> sotherton said tweaking events would create a new slate and new records </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she said could we go back to yards or run 101m instead of 100m </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we all know that some of the records are completely out there </s>
<s> but not all of those records were achieved by people who cheated </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> scrapping those records is unfair on those athletes </s>
<s> and what about my pre2005 performances did they happen does this apply to national records too </s>
<s> sotherton referred to the iaafs decision to remodel the mens javelin in 1986 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> changes were made to the javelins design because of increasingly frequent flat landings </s>
<s> all existing records were reset after the change but not erased </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i am open to the discussion  for the greater good of the sport its a good thing she added </s>

<s> spanish authorities must pay excyclist roberto heras 725000 euros 612592 after the countrys supreme court rejected their appeal against his overturned positive doping test </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> heras 43 tested positive for the banned substance erythropoietin epo at the 2005 tour of spain and was suspended for two years by spains royal cycling federation </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the findings were overturned in 2011 and heras sued the spanish state in 2013 for 1 million euros but the compensation has been reduced </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> washington ap president donald trump on thursday granted a rare posthumous pardon to boxings first black heavyweight champion clearing jack johnsons name more than 100 years after what many see as his raciallycharged conviction </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its my honor to do it </s>
<s> its about time trump said during an oval office ceremony where he was joined by boxer lennox lewis and actor sylvester stallone who has drawn awareness to johnsons cause </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> trump said johnson had served 10 months in prison for what many view as a raciallymotivated injustice and described his decision as an effort to correct a wrong in our history </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> he represented something that was both very beautiful and very terrible at the same time trump said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> johnson was convicted in 1913 by an allwhite jury for violating the mann act which made it illegal to transport women across state lines for immoral purposes for traveling with his white girlfriend </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> trump had said previously that stallone had brought johnsons story to his attention in a phone call </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> his trials and tribulations were great his life complex and controversial trump tweeted in april </s>
<s> others have looked at this over the years most thought it would be done but yes i am considering a full pardon </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> johnson is a legendary figure in boxing and crossed over into popular culture decades ago with biographies dramas and documentaries following the civil rights era </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> he died in 1946 </s>
<s> his greatgreat niece has pressed trump for a posthumous pardon and sen </s>
<s> john mccain rariz </s>
<s>  and former senate majority leader harry reid dnev </s>
<s>  have been pushing johnsons case for years </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the son of former slaves johnson defeated tommy burns for the heavyweight title in 1908 at a time when blacks and whites rarely entered the same ring </s>
<s> he then mowed down a series of great white hopes culminating in 1910 with the undefeated former champion james j </s>
<s> jeffries </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mccain previously told the associated press that johnson was a boxing legend and pioneer whose career and reputation were ruined by a racially charged conviction more than a century ago </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> johnsons imprisonment forced him into the shadows of bigotry and prejudice and continues to stand as a stain on our national honor mccain has said </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> posthumous pardons are rare but not unprecedented </s>
<s> president bill clinton pardoned henry o </s>
<s> flipper the first africanamerican officer to lead the buffalo soldiers of the 10th cavalry regiment during the civil war and bush pardoned charles winters an american volunteer in the arabisraeli war convicted of violating the u </s>
<s> s </s>
<s> neutrality acts in 1949 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> linda e </s>
<s> haywood the greatgreat niece wanted barack obama the nations first black president to pardon johnson but justice department policy says processing posthumous pardon petitions is grounded in the belief that the time of the officials involved in the clemency process is better spent on the pardon and commutation requests of living persons </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the justice department makes decisions on potential pardons through an application process and typically makes recommendations to the president </s>
<s> the general doj policy is to not accept applications for posthumous pardons for federal convictions according to the departments website </s>
<s> but trump has shown a willingness to work around the doj process in the past </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> ajegunle is known for being one of lagos toughest most dangerous slums but it also has another reputation  for producing some of nigerias top footballers </s>
<s> so whats the secret to its unlikely success bbc africas stanley kwenda has been finding out </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> for a footballobsessed nation like nigeria talent can be found in every corner but theres definitely something special about ajegunle or aj city as its known by locals </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> since the early 1990s ajegunle has been churning out football talent </s>
<s> famous names such as taribo west odion ighalo brown ideye samson siasia obafemi martins taribo west and jonathan akpoborie all started here </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> life is not easy for many of the residents of this sprawling ghetto </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> they have to contend with high crime rates as well the absence of running water gridpowered electricity or healthcare </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> so what are the factors that contribute to ajegunleys footballing pedigree diversity for one </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its a community with so many people from different ethnicities says bennedict ehenemba a football scout for german clubs who is a native of ajegunle </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> ajegunle accommodates the yorubas the igbos the hausas the itsekiris and all the other tribes in nigeria </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its a raw talent hub of nigeria he tells me </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> image caption </s>
<s> young boys have to find safe spaces to play football in ajegunle </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> byrne had surgery on monday following a crash at snetterton on 17 may </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> superbike championship organisers said he was briefly unconscious on the track after the crash at turn 3 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i have two bruised lungs all of my ribs fractured four broken vertebrae a broken neck in two places broken septum collarbone multiple other back fractures byrne said on saturday </s>

<s>  </s>

<s> after three rounds of the 2018 championship twotime defending champion byrne is third in the overall standings after winning one race at brands hatch in april </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the 2018 superbike championship continues at snetterton in june </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> many success stories can be traced back to two local institutions  st marys catholic church and the navy barracks camp </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> they remain safe places for many young people to play the game </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> other open spaces are often claimed by socalled area boys unruly gangs who often demand a fee for people to play there </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> super eagles striker jonathan akpoborie who made his name in germanys bundesliga in the 1990s also honed his skills here </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this is actually the home of football in nigeria akpoborie tells me adding that the game is seen by many youngsters as a route to a better life </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> i dont want to downgrade the area by attributing the success of footballers to poverty but theres just nothing to do for the kids </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> they spend most of their time here playing football and in so doing they develop themselves and naturally become gifted footballers </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in one national team theres always one player who originated from ajegunle </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its exactly how i started  the grownups play first we watch them play then eventually we get in the field </s>
<s> they were inspirational to us </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> image copyrightgetty images </s>
<s> image caption </s>
<s> nigerian forward jonathan akpoborie made his name in germany in the 1990s </s>
<s> the slum also has an established system of grassroots football which encourages talented youngsters to play competitive football for local clubs at an early age </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> this often gives them an edge over players at competing academies across the country </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> alfred emuejeraye who plies his trade in the swiss lower leagues also grew up in ajegunle </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> he believes the secret of the slum lies in its deep love of the game </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the people here the community are passionate about football passionate about everything and are driven to succeed in whatever they do from musicians to taxi drivers </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its an allround community he tells me </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> odion ighalo  formerly of watford fc in the english premier league but now playing for chinese super league outfit changchun yatai fc  is another ajegunle native </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> now he lives in some of the worlds biggest cities but still remembers ajegunle fondly </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it was very tough growing up there </s>
<s> its not like in europe where you have everything provided </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> you have to look for money to buy football shoes jerseys transport and even water for to drink after training </s>
<s> if you cant afford the transport then you stay  and those who stay are great players says ighalo </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> image copyrightgetty images </s>
<s> image caption </s>
<s> odion ighalo  a striker for chinese club changchun yatai fc  grew up in ajegunle </s>
<s> bolarinwa olajide is a sports reporter with lagosbased radio station wazobia </s>
<s> he saw many of these players emerge from ajegunle over the years </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> we see the hopeless those who know they have a talent but they cant exhibit it anywhere </s>
<s> they cant afford fees to join a football academy so they go to ajegunle because they know scouts come to watch them play and its a chance to show what they can do as footballers he tells me </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> leicester city and nigeria midfielder wilfred ndidi did not grow up in ajegunle but played against boys from the slum during his time at an academy in lagos </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> he believes ajegunle has produced good football players because the boys there work hard the lifestyle is difficult so they try to work very hard and come out with their best </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> to keep the ajegunle legacy going some of the footballers are already giving back to the community with projects to nurture future talent </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> akpoborie is helping to identify future football talent while ighalo is building an orphanage in the heart of the slum </s>

<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>

<s> however after being approached by the bbc raiders admitted this was not the case and removed the statement from their website but insisted he had been a coach at the melbourne tigers in 2016 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> but basketball australia told the bbc he was not a registered coach during that year and nigel purchase melbourne tigers general manager said mr white fulfilled advisory and scouting roles at the club but would not say whether he was a paid employee </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mr white left plymouth raiders shortly after the bbc contacted the club </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> image copyrightplymouth raiders </s>
<s> image caption </s>
<s> a statement in the plymouth raiders website citing mr whites experience at melbourne tigers was taken down after questions were asked by the bbc </s>
<s> to get a uk visa mr white must have been either a head coach or assistant coach in the past two seasons in a senior professional league </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the home office would not say if it would investigate stating they do not comment on individual cases </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> a plymouth raiders statement said our background checks on mr white included a letter from the chief executive of the melbourne tigers clearly stating that he was employed in an assistant coach role with the club last summer </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the club said it had stuck rigidly to the criteria laid down by basketball england in order to obtain a governing body endorsement which is required to get a visa </s>

<s> mr white was contacted </s>
<s> in 2009 the ioc decided to add womens boxing to the list of olympic sports for the london games in 2012 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> boxing had been the only sport reserved for men at the games </s>
<s> debates raged about this decision </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> should boxing be an olympic sport for anyone especially women was it progress was this creating a new sport at the expense of some existing sports </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mostly the debate centred on whether women should engage in a sport the main purpose of which is to inflict damage on your opponent and in the professional game possibility to knock the other person unconscious </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> many people think that this is a new olympic sport for women and know little if anything about the fact that womens boxing has a history that stretches back to the 18th century in many parts of the world </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> having said that prize fighting would be a more accurate description of the activity which often took place at fairgrounds and in exhibition halls in europe in the 18th and 19th centuries </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> mc marykom </s>
<s> mc marykom has been nicknamed magnificent mary </s>
<s> when boxing became one of the olympic sports at the third modern olympics in st louis in 1904 womens boxing was a displayed event a brief moment in the 20th century games </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its invisibility during much of the 20th century doesnt mean that women werent boxing </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> they may not have been on television or taking part in professional fights with big prize money but the sport was being practised </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> the history of womens boxing is somewhat different from that of many other sports which may account for some of the controversies which have surrounded it </s>
<s> womens boxing can be seen to have started in england in the 1720s in the form of prize fighting </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> in the 19th century womens boxing was prohibited in many us states and in europe it was banned in britain in 1880 not very long after queensberry rules had been implemented in 1865 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> up until the mid20th century there were however exhibitions and bouts on both sides of the atlantic with popular fighters like battling barbara buttrick who actually did have a fight screened on television in 1954 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> legal battle </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> during the 1970s several us states allowed women to box permitted new licences and approved bouts with more than four rounds and in 1993 womens amateur boxing was integrated into the rules of the us amateur programme </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it was not however until 1996 in the us that womens professional boxing was formally accepted and the christy martin bout with deirdre gogarty marked the birth of modern professional womens boxing in the us </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> it was another two years before jane couch won her legal battle on grounds of sex discrimination with the british board of control in the uk </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> jane couch </s>
<s> jane couch fought a legal battle to be a boxer </s>
<s> there are three types of womens boxing  amateur professional and unlicensed </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> at the end of the 20th century the international amateur boxing association accepted new rules for womens boxing and approved the first european cup for women in 1999 and the first world championships for women in 2001 </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> boxing remains controversial both for women and for men and new regulations have been brought in to make the sport safer although boxing is far from the top of the tables of risk of severe injury </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> according to an australian survey in 1998 reported by aiba see link on right boxing came 10th in a league table of sporting injuries with rugby league well ahead followed by sports such as rugby union motor cycling cricket and soccer </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> disciplined regime </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> amateur boxing is a long way from prize fighting </s>
<s> in the 21st century there is considerable interest in the sport at all levels </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> boxing is a highly regulated sport which many women enjoy as a means of keeping fit as a disciplined regime through which you can gain selfesteem and feel good about your body </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its a competitive sport in which you can not only achieve a personal best but also gain pride in representing your country and engaging in global sport for example at the olympics </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> its a tough sport but women have fought for the right to join in and in 2012 they can at the olympics too </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> young women like four times world amateur boxing champion minimum weight boxer mc marycom of india are looking forward to demonstrating their skill </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> kath woodward is professor of sociology at the open university and head of department </s>
<s> she works on what is social and cultural about sport </s>
<s>  </s>
<s>  </s>
<s> she researches gender and diversity in sport and has just completed the ahrc tuning in project on sport across diasporas on the bbc world service </s>
